title: FREELANCE MUA's
description:
The FREELANCE MUA's app is on-demand software that will give its client users access to Certified Make Up Artists, Beauty Industry Technicians, and Stylists in the area the client user is in need. By allowing client users the ability to browse portfolios and reviews, client users may choose any artist / service provider in and around the location in the city the client users are in at the time. FREELANCE MUA's will allow client users to request and book services in advance or at a moment鈥檚 notice, to be performed where the client users are, or at the artists鈥 location. 

FREELANCE MUA's will give artist users the opportunity to start or grow and manage their makeup and beauty (glamour) businesses from the convenience of their 鈥渋n-the-app鈥 Business Profile home page. Artist users simply create and share, their app business profiles to their social media and have their client users visit their 鈥渋n-the-app鈥 business page. Client users will browse that artist users鈥 portfolio, pick and book the artist user by location, in advance or on-demand. 

Every time a client user books an artist, that artist will receive a notification of service requested. Upon that artist accepting the request, a 鈥渃lient user deposit鈥 will be reserved for that artist. When the artist has completed a service, full payment will be charged and the artist鈥檚 pay will be sent to his / her bank account weekly. Artist users will also have the option to accept or deny clients based on location, reviews (of other artists鈥 and the artist himself / herself) and artist user鈥檚 availability.

With the FREELANCE MUA's app, artist users will not need to create their own website and will no longer need to keep track or update all of their different social media portfolios and clients. 

All an artist user has to do is create an account within the FREELANCE MUA's app, choose a standard or paid subscription, set his / her own working hours, set the locations of the cities he / she would like to work in, upload his / her certification, create a portfolio and provide his / her pay info. Our app will help keep calendars and appointments up to date and organised, down to the hour.

title: GAP Trail
description:
The Great Allegheny Passage (GAP) is a scenic, safe, and satisfying 150-mile rail-trail through the Allegheny Mountains, it's the longest such trail east of the Mississippi River. In Cumberland, the GAP connects to the C&O Canal Towpath, which runs from Washington, D.C. to Cumberland along the Potomac River. Using both trails, riders can trace a 332-mile path outlining our country鈥檚 westward expansion.

The Great Allegheny Passage soars over valleys, snakes around mountains, and skirts alongside three rivers (the Casselman, Youghiogheny, and Monongahela) on its nearly level path. Cyclists pass through the Cumberland Narrows, cross the Mason-Dixon Line, top the Eastern Continental Divide at 2,392鈥, weave through the breathtaking Laurel Highlands, wind their way through 19,052-acre Ohiopyle State Park, journey through the region鈥檚 coke, coal, mining, and steel-making corridor, and end at Pittsburgh鈥檚 majestic Point State Park.

Stunning views of waterfalls, gorges, river valleys, and farmland are everywhere, especially from outside the 3,294鈥 Big Savage Tunnel, from the sweeping 909鈥 Keystone and 1,908鈥 Salisbury Viaducts, at both ends of the 849鈥 Pinkerton Tunnel, via the soaring Ohiopyle High and Low Bridges, and the 1,174鈥 Hot Metal Bridge. Riders overlook the joining of rivers at Confluence, McKeesport, and Pittsburgh, and can explore adjoining peninsulas, hollows, wildflower stands, and forests at many places along the trail.

Get a TrailGuide book and maps at www.GAPtrail.org

title: Get Any Girl: The Ultimate Pickup and Dating Guide
description:
Have you ever wondered if there was a certain way you could act to attract the women around you? 

Well, it has actually become apparent that there is a very particular way of behaving which is considered "attractive" by women. No matter how much "free-will" we think we have, when it comes to mating, we are mostly motivated by instinct-controlled bodies. In fact, our bodies are constantly listening for "cues of attraction". And every time you come in contact with something which your instincts deem "attractive", you are given a neuro-chemical treat in your brain which produces a feeling of pleasure. Fundamentally, it is the chase for this feeling which controls the actions of both men and women in their search for a mate. 

For a man, the strongest feelings of attraction come from the form of the female body, it's something seen. But for a woman, the strongest feelings come from a "mental-model" they construct in their minds, something imagined. And this is the key to understanding how to attract women, because knowing how to complete a woman's mental-model is ultimately the secret to triggering a strong feeling of attraction in her. This concept is the basis for this course and the key to getting any girl you will ever meet. 

Get Any Girl is first and foremost based on you and your ability to use this concept to attract women... 

- In 鈥淕ame Theory鈥, we will utilize the techniques of Neuro-Linguistic Programming to lay a foundation for new behavioral-patterns based on "The Pillars of Attraction".  These are the characteristics used to complete a woman's "mental-model" and trigger attraction.

- In 鈥淪elf-Empower鈥, we will utilize several techniques to clear you of any limiting-beliefs which could be hindering your self-confidence and your ability to approach new women. 

- In 鈥淭he Pickup鈥, we will walk through a pickup from start to finish. This includes everything you will need to do in order to successfully approach a woman, get her number, and even take her home with you from a bar. 

- In 鈥淭he Relationship鈥 we will, analyze the best first-date ideas, take a look at the "early relationship dynamic", learn how to supply romance and drama to keep her interested, and even touch on the idea of love and what it means to women.

After all that, you should be ready for anything the Dating World has to throw at you...

title: Golden Volunteer Opportunities
description:
2017 FACEBOOK SOCIAL GOOD APP OF THE YEAR
2017 WEBBY HONOREE - PUBLIC SERVICE AND ACTIVISM

Golden is no ordinary community service app or volunteer app. Create Golden Moments by searching volunteer opportunities. Go from volunteering to volunteered.

Find opportunities near you, based on capacity and organizers' schedules, or take part in the Treasure Hunt to get organizations in your area on to Golden!

Currently featuring Opportunities in the following markets:
Los Angeles
San Francisco
Boston
Miami
Houston
Chicago
And more!

Be one today and explore the causes, generosity, nonprofit jobs, and volunteer opportunities. Start giving back by becoming part of your favorite charities and organizations.

Forget everything you think you know about volunteering. Discover experiences you鈥檇 want to. Be doing regardless of how they鈥檙e labeled. Find new ways to have fun with your friends, and meet new ones. It鈥檚 easy.

Golden also gives you credit toward community service requirements. 

VOLUNTEERING MADE SIMPLE:

Golden鈥檚 simplified and easy to use experience helps volunteers explore new volunteer opportunities.

INSTANT BACKGROUND CHECKS:

This is also the best app for anyone to run an instant, secure, portable background check. Use it for your favorite non-profit or even vet a new roommate!

QUALITY VOLUNTEER OPPORTUNITIES:

We work with over 2000 of the top companies, nonprofits, and community service influencers. Our volunteer specialist vets each volunteer opportunity. This allows Golden to provide only the best volunteer opportunities available.

INVITE YOUR FRIENDS:

Volunteering is an excellent way to meet new people and explore your generosity. Each time you choose to volunteer, you can invite you friends and family to volunteer with you!

Download, Login, and find your perfect Golden Moment.

Now you鈥檙e Golden!

title: Good Day(s)
description:
Good Day(s) adopts the agile mindset taking over the business world to your daily life. It is a way to keep track of everything you want to do, not just in your life, but today... tomorrow... and the next.  Break down your goals into a daily roadmap to success, and have fun doing it. At Good Day(s) we keep it silly, and make the setting/achieving of goals something fun, instead of something boring.  It's intended for use each day for roughly 30 seconds.  That's it!  How, you ask?  Give it a try and see!

Now, this is a goal app, so let's talk about methodology.  Good Day(s) is a lifestyle application, rooted in Malcolm Gladwell's theory for "Outliers."  Set goals for yourself and repeat them as often as you like.  Work every day toward having a "Good Day" and see what you accomplish.

If you've read this far, hopefully you're ready to give Good Day(s) a try.  Make your first Good Day is today.  Remember: keep it silly and always be awesome.

title: Grateful: A Gratitude Journal
description:
According to researchers at the Harvard Medical School, 鈥淕ratitude helps people feel more positive emotions, relish good experiences, improve their health, deal with adversity, and build strong relationships.鈥 Grateful was created to make expressing gratitude in your life both easy and fun, as well as to remind you,  during those down moments, of the many blessings in your life (that you've documented in Grateful). 

*Daily Prompts to Start You Off*
With its simple interface and daily prompts, Grateful is designed to make reflection and giving thanks both a joyful and easy process.  Daunted by a blank page? Not quite sure where to start? Grateful will greet you with one question, such as. 'What made you smile today'? or 'What made today a good day?'. All you have to do is answer. It can be a simple word. Or a simple paragraph. Grateful allows for both. You can also add a photo to support your thoughts.

*Easy to Browse your Past Entries*
Grateful's simple  journal feed  lets you browse your entries by TIME or by PROMPT. Want to see all the things that made you smile this year? Jump to those entries in your timeline. Want to see what your state of mind was last January? Jump to that month in your timeline.

*Our Prompts or Yours*
Grateful gives you the flexibility to make the journal truly yours. When sit down to write an entry, Grateful will start you off with a prompt. You have the option of:
1.) Answering the prompt
2.) Choosing a different prompt
3.) Writing your own prompt

*Totally Private*
No sign ups. No logins. No Facebook integration. All you data resides only on your device.

FREE Features:
鈥 15 journal entries
鈥 Unlimited reminders
鈥 No login of any kind required. This journal is for you only.
鈥 Each session starts with a prompt, making writing easy.
鈥 Grateful lets you answer the prompt and also save any additional thoughts for later reading.
鈥 Ability to edit past entries
鈥 Customize your timeline - show entries by time, prompt, tag, or randomly

Additional PREMIUM Features 
(available with one-time upgrade or with a Growth Bundle subscription):
鈥 Unlimited entries (Free version allows 15 entries)
鈥 Data backup with Dropbox and iCloud
鈥 Passcode with Face ID for added privacy security 
鈥 Ability to create your own prompts to answer
鈥 Export your entries to file (PDF or CSV format)

Grateful鈥榮 GROWTH BUNDLE is an optional monthly or annual subscription. If you choose to upgrade, payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, for the chosen plan's price.

Subscriptions may be managed and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to your iTunes/App Store Account Settings after purchase.  No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period. 

Read our full Privacy Policy/Terms here:
http://treebetty.com/main/privacy

title: Guardian Angel Tarot Cards - Virtue, Valentine
description:
Get a 7-day FREE TRIAL to Doreen Virtue and Radleigh Valentine鈥檚 Guardian Angel Tarot Cards!

After the successful launch of their best-selling 鈥淎ngel Tarot Cards鈥, Doreen Virtue and Radleigh Valentine knew that some people were still wary of tarot. So they created this 78-card deck and accompanying guidebook for highly sensitive people who desire the accurate and detailed answers of tarot cards, along with gentle words and images. Even sweeter than their other decks, the 鈥淕uardian Angel Tarot Cards鈥 provide a comforting and safe way to get clear messages for yourself and others.

Whether you鈥檙e getting guidance for yourself, a loved one, or a client, you鈥檒l find that the Guardian Angel Tarot Cards will speak clearly to you.


FEATURES:
- Give readings anywhere, anytime on your iOS device*
- Choose between 1-card, 3-card, 5-card, 10-card and 12-card readings*
- Save your readings to review at any time*
- Email readings to friends*
- Flip cards over to read each message
- Review the entire deck of cards in Browse mode
- Learn more from the complete guidebook

*After your 7-day FREE TRIAL, a one-time in-app purchase will unlock these premium features

About the Author

Doreen Virtue holds B.A., M.A., and Ph.D. degrees in counseling psychology, and is a lifelong clairvoyant who works with the angelic realm. She is the author of the Healing with the Angels book and oracle cards; Archangels & Ascended Masters; and Angel Therapy庐, among other works. She recently released the Angel Blessings Candle Kit (with her son Grant) and her first children鈥檚 book Thank You, Angels. Her new works, Angel Numbers 101, Magical Messages from the Fairies Oracle Cards, Angel Therapy Meditations CD, and her first novel鈥擲olomon鈥檚 Angels is available now. Her products are available in most languages worldwide.

You can listen to Doreen鈥檚 live weekly radio show, and call her for a reading, by visiting www.HayHouseRadio.com

Radleigh Valentine is an internationally known speaker, author, spiritual intuitive, radio-show host, and a recovering Certified Public Accountant. After leaving the corporate world, Radleigh became widely recognized as the co-author (with Doreen) of the best-selling Angel Tarot Cards and Archangel Power Tarot Cards. For more information, please visit: www.RadleighValentine.com.

Official Hay House licensed iOS App: www.hayhouse.com

title: Hairstyles for Your Face Shape
description:
Have you ever had a question "What hairstyle is better for my face shape?". This app will help you to identify your face shape and check a lot of different hairstyles.

You would need to know your shape of face for finding 鈥渢he right鈥 haircut or hairstyle.

Some real reviews:

Title: Great Editing Features Allow Real-Life Looks 
By Busy University Mom
I love how the editing tools allow me to move and stretch hairstyles and colors to fit my pictures. This creates a more vivid and true representation of the various hairstyles. Thanks guys!!

Title: Cute cute 
By SuzanneApp1
This app explains how to choose the right hairstyle depending on you face shape. And I found it :)

Though every person's face is unique, it's generally accepted that there are six basic face shapes. And though many people may not have thought about the shape of their face, there are many whose faces have characteristics they don't love.

Whichever category you fit into, there are simple things you can do to enhance your best features and bring forward your best 'you.'

The main features of this application is the hairstyling tips, for  female of different face shapes to make your face shape clear , whichever shape it is, look balanced and proportionate.

The basic seven male and female shapes are given below . . .
- Oval
- Square
- Round
- Heart 
- Oblong
- Diamond

Choose your face shape and find the best hairstyles that suits you. Download now and enjoy!

- You can hear every tiny noise, every breath or sigh of sound, even if you are away (in a live audio-video stream). The Home Security Monitor Camera could be used as an audio remote control of your safe home. 

MULTIPLATFORM 
- Home Security Monitor Camera allows you to monitor an area from an unlimited number of devices. You can connect to devices on different software platforms. 

FAST CONFIGURATION 
- Fast and secure configuration over local WiFi with automatic device lookup or over QR invitation code takes less than 30 seconds. 

UNLIMITED RANGE 
- A wide range of supported networks brings you limitless connectivity. Thanks to the Home Security Monitor Camera, you stay connected wherever you go, even where there is a weak WiFi signal. 

SECURITY FIRST 
- All communication is securely encrypted via cloud solution. Industry standard encryption is used to ensure that only your viewers have access to your stream. 

BATTERY ALERT 
- Stay informed about the battery status on the remote device. The alarm will always alert you when the battery level drops below 10 % or an individually set value. 

HOME SECURITY ALARM BUNDLE 
- With our Home Security Monitor Camera, you only pay once and you are then free to use the application on several devices. 

WIDE RANGE SET OF OPTIONS 
- Want to personalize some features? It鈥檚 only up to your imagination how you will use our surveillance camera. Do you love using Security Camera? 

It would be nice if you could leave a positive and honest review in the AppStore. Thank you for using and supporting the Security Camera.

Use the app without limits on your Wi-Fi or buy our subscriptions for cloud connection to use the app on different networks or two different Wi-Fi. Without subscribing, you gain a reliable assistant working seamlessly if all your devices are on the same Wi-Fi only. Once you subscribe to use cloud connection, you are free to combine networks to suit all of your needs.
 
If you opt for cloud connection via subscription, you gain:
1. a reliable mode of connecting to your local network via 3G/4G/LTE
2. access to our servers throughout continents to ensure you never fall out of touch
3. unique multiplatform connection on mobile or desktop
 
We offer weekly, monthly, quarterly or yearly subscriptions. The cost of the subscription is $0.99 weekly, $1.99 monthly, $2.49 quarterly, $9.99 yearly. 

All subscriptions are auto-renewable. Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. The subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off 24 hours before the end of the current period. All subscriptions can be managed by the user in Account Settings. 

You can find our Terms of Use at http://www.mastertouchapps.com/home-security-monitor-system/terms-of-service and our Privacy Policy at http://www.mastertouchapps.com/home-security-monitor-system/privacy-policy

title: HomeApp - 薪械写胁懈卸懈屑芯褋褌褜
description:
Home邪pp 鈥 锌褉懈谢芯卸械薪懈械 懈 褋芯胁褉械屑械薪薪褘泄 褌械褏薪芯谢芯谐懈褔械褋泻懈泄 褋械褉胁懈褋, 泻芯褌芯褉褘泄 锌芯蟹胁芯谢褟械褌 泻褍锌懈褌褜 懈谢懈 锌褉芯写邪褌褜 泻胁邪褉褌懈褉褍 胁 袦芯褋泻胁械 谢械谐泻芯, 胁褘谐芯写薪芯 懈 斜械蟹芯锌邪褋薪芯.

袦褘 褋芯斜褉邪谢懈 胁褋械 锌褉械写谢芯卸械薪懈褟 胁 袦芯褋泻胁械 薪邪 芯写薪芯泄 褍写芯斜薪芯泄 泻邪褉褌械. 袧邪褕懈屑 泻谢懈械薪褌邪屑 写芯褋褌褍锌薪褘 褌械褏薪芯谢芯谐懈懈 锌械褉褋芯薪邪谢褜薪芯谐芯 锌芯懈褋泻邪 褋邪屑褘褏 胁褘谐芯写薪褘褏 锌褉械写谢芯卸械薪懈泄, 褔褌芯 锌芯蟹胁芯谢褟械褌 懈屑 褍蟹薪邪胁邪褌褜 芯 褋邪屑褘褏 胁褘谐芯写薪褘褏 锌褉械写谢芯卸械薪懈褟褏 锌械褉胁褘屑懈 懈 锌芯泻褍锌邪褌褜 泻胁邪褉褌懈褉褘 褔邪褋褌芯 蟹薪邪褔懈褌械谢褜薪芯 写械褕械胁谢械 褉褘薪泻邪. 校褌芯褔薪懈褌褜 懈薪褎芯褉屑邪褑懈褞 锌芯 谢褞斜芯泄 泻胁邪褉褌懈褉械 懈谢懈 薪邪蟹薪邪褔懈褌褜 锌褉芯褋屑芯褌褉 褌械锌械褉褜 屑芯卸薪芯 褔械褉械蟹 谢懈褔薪芯谐芯 屑械薪械写卸械褉邪 胁芯 胁褋褌褉芯械薪薪芯屑 褔邪褌械, 褌邪泻 卸械 泻邪泻 懈 蟹邪写邪褌褜 胁芯锌褉芯褋褘 懈 褍褌芯褔薪懈褌褜 懈薪褎芯褉屑邪褑懈褞 褍 薪邪褕懈褏 褞褉懈褋褌芯胁.

Home邪pp 鈥 褝褌芯 褋芯胁褉械屑械薪薪邪褟, 锌褉芯褎械褋褋懈芯薪邪谢褜薪邪褟, 褍写芯斜薪邪褟 懈 斜械蟹芯锌邪褋薪邪褟 邪谢褜褌械褉薪邪褌懈胁邪 褉懈褝谢褌械褉褋泻芯屑褍 褋械褉胁懈褋褍

袣邪泻 褝褌芯 褉邪斜芯褌邪械褌 鈥 褍写芯斜薪褘泄 锌芯懈褋泻 斜械蟹 褉械泻谢邪屑褘, 写褍斜谢械泄 懈 屑芯褕械薪薪懈泻芯胁

袙 褉械卸懈屑械 褉械邪谢褜薪芯谐芯 胁褉械屑械薪懈 屑褘 褋芯斜懈褉邪械屑 胁褋械 泻胁邪褉褌懈褉褘 薪邪 锌褉芯写邪卸褍, 薪邪褕懈 邪谢谐芯褉懈褌屑褘 芯锌褉械写械谢褟褞褌 锌芯胁褌芯褉褘, 褎懈泻褋懈褉褍褞褌 懈蟹屑械薪械薪懈褟 褑械薪褘, 胁褘斜懈褉邪褞褌 薪邪懈斜芯谢械械 胁褘谐芯写薪褘械 懈 芯褌褋械懈胁邪褞褌 屑芯褕械薪薪懈泻芯胁. 袧邪 泻邪褉褌械 芯褋褌邪褞褌褋褟 褌芯谢褜泻芯 褉械邪谢褜薪褘械 泻胁邪褉褌懈褉褘 斜械蟹 写褍斜谢械泄 懈 屑芯褕械薪薪懈泻芯胁. 袧邪褕懈 泻谢懈械薪褌褘 懈屑械褞褌 胁芯蟹屑芯卸薪芯褋褌褜 懈褋泻邪褌褜, 懈褋锌芯谢褜蟹褍褟 褍写芯斜薪褘械 懈 锌芯写褉芯斜薪褘械 褎懈谢褜褌褉褘, 芯褎芯褉屑懈褌褜 锌芯写锌懈褋泻褍 懈 褋屑芯褌褉械褌褜 褋邪屑褍褞 锌芯写褉芯斜薪褍褞 懈薪褎芯褉屑邪褑懈褞 锌芯 写芯屑邪屑 懈 芯褌写械谢褜薪褘屑 泻胁邪褉褌懈褉邪屑, 胁泻谢褞褔邪褟 写懈薪邪屑懈泻褍 懈蟹屑械薪械薪懈褟 褑械薪褘 懈 锌谢邪薪懈褉芯胁泻懈.

袣邪泻 褝褌芯 褉邪斜芯褌邪械褌 鈥 斜褘褋褌褉褘泄 锌芯懈褋泻 胁褘谐芯写薪褘褏 锌褉械写谢芯卸械薪懈泄

袧邪褕邪 锌谢邪褌褎芯褉屑邪 邪薪邪谢懈蟹懈褉褍械褌 胁邪褕懈 锌邪褉邪屑械褌褉褘 锌芯懈褋泻邪 懈 褍胁械写芯屑谢褟械褌 薪邪褕褍 泻芯屑邪薪写褍 褝泻褋锌械褉褌芯胁 锌芯 褉邪泄芯薪邪屑, 械褋谢懈 薪芯胁芯械 锌芯褟胁懈胁褕械械褋褟 锌褉械写谢芯卸械薪懈械 屑芯卸械褌 胁邪屑 锌芯写芯泄褌懈. 袦褘 褍蟹薪邪械屑 胁褋褞 写芯锌芯谢薪懈褌械谢褜薪褍褞 懈薪褎芯褉屑邪褑懈褞 锌芯 薪芯胁芯泄 泻胁邪褉褌懈褉械 懈 褉械泻芯屑械薪写褍械屑 械械 胁邪屑 锌褉褟屑芯 褔械褉械蟹 锌褉懈谢芯卸械薪懈械. 袙 懈褌芯谐械, 蟹邪 褋褔械褌 褋泻芯褉芯褋褌懈 懈 薪邪褕械泄 邪薪邪谢懈褌懈泻懈, 胁褘 褍蟹薪邪械褌械 锌械褉胁褘屑懈 芯 褋邪屑褘褏 胁褘谐芯写薪褘褏 锌褉械写谢芯卸械薪懈褟褏 胁 谐芯褉芯写械. 袙 褉械泻芯屑械薪写邪褑懈懈 褍写芯斜薪芯 胁褋褌褉芯械薪 褔邪褌, 褌邪泻 褔褌芯 胁褘 屑芯卸械褌械 褍褌芯褔薪懈褌褜 胁褋褞 懈薪褎芯褉屑邪褑懈褞 芯 胁褘谐芯写薪芯屑 锌褉械写谢芯卸械薪懈懈 屑芯屑械薪褌邪谢褜薪芯 褍 薪邪褕械谐芯 褝泻褋锌械褉褌邪.

袣邪泻 褝褌芯 褉邪斜芯褌邪械褌 鈥 薪邪蟹薪邪褔械薪懈械 懈 锌褉芯胁械写械薪懈械 锌褉芯褋屑芯褌褉芯胁

袧邪 胁褋械 胁褉械屑褟 锌芯懈褋泻邪 蟹邪 胁邪屑懈 蟹邪泻褉械锌谢褟械褌褋褟 锌械褉褋芯薪邪谢褜薪褘泄 屑械薪械写卸械褉, 薪邪褕 褝泻褋锌械褉褌 锌芯 褉邪泄芯薪褍. 袨薪 芯褌胁械褌懈褌 薪邪 胁褋械 胁邪褕懈 胁芯锌褉芯褋褘 锌芯 谢褞斜芯泄 泻胁邪褉褌懈褉械 懈 锌芯屑芯卸械褌 褋褎芯褉屑懈褉芯胁邪褌褜 褍写芯斜薪芯械 褉邪褋锌懈褋邪薪懈械 锌芯泻邪蟹芯胁 锌褉褟屑芯 褔械褉械蟹 胁褋褌褉芯械薪薪褘械 屑械褋褋械薪写卸械褉 胁 锌褉懈谢芯卸械薪懈懈. 袨薪 褌邪泻卸械 斜褍写械褌 褋芯锌褉芯胁芯卸写邪褌褜 胁邪褋 薪邪 锌褉芯褋屑芯褌褉邪褏, 锌芯屑芯卸械褌 锌褉芯胁械褋褌懈 锌械褉械谐芯胁芯褉褘 锌芯 泻胁邪褉褌懈褉械 懈 锌褉芯胁械褋褌懈 锌褉械写胁邪褉懈褌械谢褜薪褍褞 芯褑械薪泻褍 褞褉懈写懈褔械褋泻懈褏 褉懈褋泻芯胁 锌芯 泻胁邪褉褌懈褉械.

袣邪泻 褝褌芯 褉邪斜芯褌邪械褌 鈥 锌褉芯胁械褉泻邪 褞褉懈写懈褔械褋泻懈褏 写芯泻褍屑械薪褌芯胁 锌械褉械写 褋写械谢泻芯泄

title: Homes for Sale, Rent
description:

We believe in a simple approach to home search. Our goal is to provide the best features. We believe the true way to your heart is through your ribcage and/or building a groovy product.  

More homes, better data.

To ensure quality listings, we partner with local data providers across the country. People often mention they find homes on our app that are not listed anywhere else. This makes them happy, which makes us very happy.

At a Glance...

鈥 Homes for Sale: Browse millions of real estate listings for sale across the U.S. including Foreclosure

鈥 Homes for Rent: Find rental homes, condos, townhomes and apartments.

鈥 Home Values: Research neighborhood market conditions through our home value estimates.

鈥 Sharing: Share the houses you love with the people you love via text message, messenger, email, Facepage and MyFace.

title: HOW TO BE CONFIDENT
description:
In the purest sense, self confidence is knowing what you're good at, the value you provide, and acting in a way that conveys that to others. Contrast this with arrogance which typically involves believing you are better in a particular area than you are, or low self-esteem which involves believing you're less valuable than you think. The closer your self-assessment is to that reality in the middle, and the more you behave accordingly, the closer you are to displaying healthy confidence.

If you're here wondering exactly how to know how to be more confident, how to have better self - esteem , more self worth, then you've come to the right place! Self Confidence can be a mixed bag, have too much and it can look like arrogance , have too little and it can look like you have low self - esteem! This guide is aimed at helping reach a healthy middle amount that is both genuine and reliable.
Building self worth isn't easy if your lacking, and have had years of negative self talk. It will take time and a bit of effort but it'll be more than worth it in the end.

If you ask anyone on how to be more confident the first thing they'll probably say is 'well what are you good at' and they are partly right!! Knowing what your particularly good at is a massive head start but there is a bit more to it. Having a good amount of self esteem also means having a good amount of self respect, which we will also give exercises and advice to help you along. This guide is here for anyone questioning how to be more confident, how to have more self respect, self esteem and more! What you think of yourself will without be the biggest deciding factor in how you feel about life. Give yourself the chance to reach your best potential..... whether it's with this guide or elsewhere. As cliche as it sounds you really do have one life!!

Included in this app. 

- How to Improve Your Self-Esteem: 12 Powerful Tips
- Speaking with More Confidence in Work and in Life.
- 9 Powerful Body Language Tips To Instantly Boost Your Confidence
- 5 Ways Mentally Strong People Deal With Rejection.
- Weird But Effective Confidence Building Exercises.
- Learn How 10 Public Figures Control Their Anxiety.
- 25 Killer Actions to Boost Your Self-Confidence
- 100 Positive-Thinking Exercises That Will Make Any One Healthier & Happier.
- Motivational Confidence Quotes 
--And More

Self respect, confidence, self esteem , self worth etc they're all part of the same tree that is you! You are literally the ONLY person in all of life that can change how you feel about yourself. It won't be easy , any bad habit to break isn't but do something for 30 days and it becomes a habit...do something for 12 months and it becomes a LIFE TIME habit.You read that right just one year out of your life to change everything...not much considering. 

App Features:

- Regular Updates
- In-Depth Guide & Explanations
- Easy To Read
- Simple Navigation
- Confidence Quotes

title: HP Youth
description:
The OFFICIAL app of HP Youth, the youth ministry of Highland Park Church in Lakeland, FL.

SPECIAL FEATURES:
* Podcast: Listen to the latest sermon or lookup a previous one in the podcast library.
* Digital Bible: Enter in the passage you want or use quick keys to go directly to the passage you desire to read.
* Free Audio Bible: Click listen and you are instantly listening to the daily devotional plan. You can also look up any passage you want, the listen tab is in the bottom right hand corner at all times.

SOCIAL INTEGRATION:
Share content with your friends via Twitter, Facebook, or email.
* Facebook: You can share a Bible passage, journal entry or anything in the app with one click.
* Twitter: You can tweet a Bible passage, reading plan, journal entry or just a note with easy.

PURSUE JOURNAL:
* Daily Bible Reading Plan: The Pursue Bible reading plan takes you through the Old Testament once a year and through the New Testament twice a year. Average reading or listening time is 15 minutes a day.
* Free Customizable Journal: The Pursue Journal is designed to give you the freedom to journal whenever and however you desire. Entries are fully secure for your privacy, yet at any time you can share them via Facebook, twitter or email.
* Cloud Based Journal: Your Pursue Journal is accessible online anytime at www.PursueJournal.com. This allows you to be able to add entries anywhere, anytime and they are automatically linked to your HP Youth app.

WiFi Internet is required for iPod touch.

For more information about HP Youth, please visit:

title: I Ching 2: an Oracle
description:
The Ultimate I Ching Reader, this program facilitates the use of the I Ching (or the Book of Changes), an ancient Chinese classic text, as an oracle. The process of consulting it in this way involves determining the hexagram by a method of random generation and then reading the text associated with that hexagram.

The I Ching in itself and the program are localized in English, Italian, French, German and Spanish so that (almost) everyone can easily access the Oracle.

The program, with an easy and streamlined interface will allow you to consult the Oracle for your important (or not important) decisions when you cannot make your mind.
The result can be saved with a title and/or can sent via email to a friend or to yourself for later reading.

The program will permit also to browse signs and lines as in the original book to allow meditation and lateral thinking.

In this excerpt from the wonderful book of Douglas Adams "Mostly Harmless", simply substituting 'I Ching' to 'Astrology' and 'coins and signs' to 'stars and planets', you'll get a very good description of what I Ching is.
"In I Ching the rules happen to be about coins and signs, but they could be about ducks and drakes for all the difference it would make. It's just a way of thinking about a problem which lets the shape of the problem begin to emerge. The more the rules, the tinier the rules, the more arbitrary they are, the better. It's like throwing a handful of fine graphite dust on a piece of paper to see where the hidden indentations are. It lets you see the words that were written on the piece of paper above it that's now been taken away and hidden. The graphite's not important. It's just the means of revealing their indentations. So you see, I Ching's nothing to do with coins and signs. It's just to do with people thinking about people".

The fact that the book track his history to more than two thousand years ago and it is one of the most important books of ancient Chinese culture add to the meaning of it as "way to find what you think".

The program simulates the casting of three coins for six times and then determines the corresponding hexagram.
The "Sign" is the resulting hexagram, with the "changing lines", the lines that are changing from one state to the other.
The text related to this hexagram will represent "the Present", the actual state of the thing. Once a hexagram is determined, each line has been determined as either changing (old) or unchanging (young).
Any line in a hexagram that is old ("changing") adds additional meaning to that hexagram. Those are "the Mutations", the changes that are happening.
Taoist philosophy holds that powerful yin will eventually turn to yang (and vice versa), so a new hexagram is formed by transposing each changing yin line with a yang line, and vice versa. Thus, further insight into the process of change is gained by reading the text of this new hexagram and studying it as the result of the current change. This second hexagram is "the Future" and represents the resulting state after the current change.

What is the must-have software in office?

Is it "Macrohard Office"? No! Who wants that crap?

In office, sometimes we don't want to do the works or no work to do. But to tell others we are useful to the company, we have to pretend working or pretend busy.

However, to pretend busy is not easy, unless you are professional in acting. 

"I'm Busy" is created because we understand that you need to pretend busy in office and want to do it without hassle.

"I'm Busy" simulates office working sounds such as typing, clicking, writing, and so on. You can change their sound volumes independently, according to your office environment. What's more, you can adjust their repeat rate so that you can control how "busy" you are.

Wanna pretend busy and sick? No problem. "I'm Busy" includes male/female coughing sounds and a sniffling sound. You can keep your annoying colleagues and boss stay away from you.

"I'm Busy", a must-have software for office workers.

title: Indeed Job Spotter
description:
Indeed Job Spotter is an awesome way to explore your community and earn redeemable points, all in the name of helping local businesses. If you spot a hiring sign, take a picture of it and the storefront, and submit it to Indeed Job Spotter. Submit enough photos to earn the most points, and we鈥檒l give you a gift card in exchange.

Submit as many hiring signs as you want. There is no limit to the points you can earn!

How Indeed Job Spotter Works:
1. Install the Indeed Job Spotter app.
2. Explore your neighborhood for hiring signs.
3. Submit a picture of both the hiring sign and the storefront.
4. Collect points for each approved submission. 
5. Redeem your points for gift cards.

title: iNELS Home RF Control
description:
iNELS Home Control (iHC) makes it easy to completely control iNELS RF Control wireless electrical installations  using a smartphone or tablet.

The application communicates with a RF/IR smart box (eLAN-RF-003 or eLAN-RF-003-Wi), which further links to the iNELS RF Control sub-elements, audio / video devices, video door-phones, cameras and weather stations. The RF smart box allows you to control up to 40 components.

The application brings you these options:
- Enhance security requirements in the form of authorization when opening an application
- Distribution of user roles
- Administrator (admin) - can set and control individual components, time schedules, scenes
- User - can control individual components and their created scenes
- Application Wizard for easier setup of the entire system
- Graphic interface with graphical switching between black and white
- Switching appliances (e.g. fan, garage door, blinds, lighting, etc.)
- Dim lighting (all light sources can be dimmed from a conventional bulb to dimmable LEDs)
- Control and regulation of hot-water or electric heating
- Combining multiple unit controls at once, scenes
- Assign cameras (iNELS Cam, Axis, or "mjpeg" and RTSP format cameras)
- Integrated weather forecast
- Intercom and 2N video door phone function
- Adding an eLAN-IR unit for controlling air conditioners, TVs and other appliances
- Widget settings
- and more鈥


Detailed iHC-MAIRF manual can be downloaded here: https://www.elkoep.com/-ihc-mairf-

title: Instawork Jobs & Gigs

The Instawork app helps you:

The Instawork app makes it easy to:

- Quickly create your profile to apply for jobs or gigs - no more paper resumes

What pros say about Instawork:

I was always put as a dishwasher. With Instawork gigs I walk into a restaurant feeling confident and know that I will be treated with respect".
Jose, prep cook and dishwasher, San Francisco

Miriam, event server, South San Francisco

Got any questions or feedback? Reach out to us at instaworkers@instawork.com

We're currently operating in the San Francisco Bay Area and Los Angeles. More locations coming soon!

title: ION Smart Badge
description:

Now you can display 鈥淭OUR GUIDE,鈥 鈥淚NFORMATION,鈥 鈥淐AN I HELP鈥 or even your name in bright red LEDs on a neat, compact badge that attaches easily to your shirt. The Smart Badge app makes it easy. Download the free app to your mobile device. You can program up to eight messages per 鈥榮et,鈥 and store them in memory for recall later on. You can adjust the brightness, font weight, scrolling speed and scrolling direction (left, stationary or right).

title: iRobot HOME
description:

The iRobot HOME is compatible with all Wi-Fi庐 connected Roomba庐 robot vacuums and Bluetooth connected Braava jet鈩 240.
 
IMPRINT鈩 SMART MAPPING*
鈥 New Roomba庐 i Series robot knows your kitchen from your living room, and creates a Smart Map for you to view in the app

* Available with Roomba庐 i Series robots
 
CLEAN MAP鈩 REPORTS*
鈥 Zoom and pan Clean Map鈩 reports in the History button to view cleaning coverage

*Available with Roomba庐 900 and i Series robots

EASY TROUBLESHOOTING 
鈥 Access detailed help content and contact Customer Care
 
AUTOMATIC SOFTWARE UPDATES
鈥 Keep your robot up-to-date with new features 
 
Requirements

鈥 Roomba庐 i Series robots support both Wi-Fi庐 networks with 2.4GHz and 5GHz band
鈥 Braava jet鈩 240 mopping robot uses Bluetooth Low Energy (also known as BLE or Bluetooth Smart) built in to most common mobile devices

title: Jitjatjo Talent
description:
Introducing Jitjatjo - flexible work and instant pay for Hospitality Workers!

Not getting enough hours? Can鈥檛 find shifts that fit your schedule? Need to get paid quickly for hours worked? We鈥檙e going to fix that for you. 

GET HIRED FAST - Apply once. Unlimited gigs.

Mobile Onboarding
Register now on your mobile device, using our simple step-by-step onboarding process, and specify the type of work you want.

Digital Sign Up - Efficient & Fast
No need for printing or paperwork. All Jitjatjo application forms can be quickly completed and signed electronically on your mobile device. Once you are registered, choose a convenient time for your face-to-face interview. We love meeting great talent.

FLEXIBLE WORK - Work When You Want.

Boost your income with extra shifts and choose complete work flexibility through Jitjatjo, the choice is yours.

No more time wasted searching for work, just enter your availability and we鈥檒l find you gigs that fit your schedule.

ENDLESS OPPORTUNITIES - Intelligent. Personalized.

We Find Gigs For You
Jitjatjo analyzes your gig preferences, past performance, assessed skills and availability, and then selects the best gig near you.

More Availability = More Gigs
We regularly receive client bookings requesting talent. The more availability you enter in Jitjatjo, the more gigs you are eligible for.

Always Improving
Every completed gig improves Jitjatjo鈥檚 matching capabilities, helping ensure we find you gigs you鈥檒l enjoy.

INSTANT PAYMENT - No joke. You鈥檙e Worth It.

Debit/Credit Card
If your card is supported, you can receive your pay within hours of finishing your gig, then withdraw cash from an ATM. You earned it.

ACH Payments
If your card is not yet supported we will wire your pay through ACH and you鈥檒l receive the funds within 24-48 hours. Spend it well.

LOVE YOUR WORK - We listen to your feedback.

Not only do you work when you want, but you work where you want. After each gig, you鈥檒l rate the experience. Don鈥檛 want to work there again? No worries! We won鈥檛 place you there anymore.

Your feedback is anonymous so employers will never know how you rated them. The rating is purely to help us enhance your experience with Jitjatjo, and find you gigs that you love.

Are you looking for restaurant, bar, or catering gigs? Download the Jitjatjo app now! Create your account and set your availability.

DISCLAIMER: This app may use your location even when it isn鈥檛 open, which can decrease device battery life.

title: JustDate - Meet, Date, Hook Up
description:
Life is hard, dating doesn鈥檛 have to be.

Connecting has never been more fun, safe, and simple. JustDate shows you the people you want to see and hides the people you don鈥檛. Our matching algorithm powered by machine learning is so effective and finding a match that we guarantee that you鈥檒l find someone you鈥檙e interested in on JustDate in less than 2 weeks.  The process is simple:

1. JustDate shows you a list of hot guys or girls in your city, hand-picked for you.

2. Swipe right to like them, swipe left to pass. If they like you too, then it鈥檚 a match.

3. The man or woman can make the first move, but if the conversation goes stale after 7 days the match will expire forever.





A note about in-app purchases:

Here at JustDate, we鈥檝e made it our mission to provide the fastest and most authentic way to meet local singles in your area for friendship and romance. To protect our users from spam and abuse, we charge a small fee in exchange for providing unlimited messaging privileges - this helps to make sure that the people you communicate with on JustDate are serious about meeting someone new.

If you choose to purchase JustDate VIP, payment will be charged to your iTunes account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours before the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in the iTunes Store after purchase. Current JustDate VIP subscription price starts at $19.99 USD per week - and renews AUTOMATICALLY every 7 days after your subscription start date.  In order to avoid being billed again - if you no longer want access to the JustDate VIP service - simply follow the directions here: https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT202039

Prices are in U.S. dollars, may vary in countries other than the U.S. and are subject to change without notice. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period. If you don鈥檛 choose to purchase JustDate VIP, you can only continue using JustDate 100% free.

Need more information?  No problem?

Our Terms of Service: https://JustDate.com/terms

Our Privacy Policy: https://JustDate.com/privacy

Safety Tips: https://JustDate.com/safety

Kinder is designed to help you and your partner find that name, the name that fits your baby but also the man or woman they grow out to be. 

With Kinder we have created an app in which you can quickly flick through name suggestions either liking or dismissing them. Your likes are than matched to the likes of your partner and by both looking for names you'll end up with a shortlist of names you both like. 

Kinder is free and we have over 18.000 names in our library with a grand variety in origins so you can find that unique name that your child will write history with!

title: Kindu For Couples
description:
We created KINDU to help couples communicate and connect with each other.  
KINDU's mission is to help you: 
-Improve the intimacy of your relationship
-Learn fun new things to do with your partner
-Discover more about your partner's desires
-Create a haven to discuss your wants and wishes
-Laugh and create inside jokes
-Begin an exciting adventure with your partner.  
-Provide personalized tips or referrals to quality products or services. 

=====================================================

Five apps for couples who can't get enough of each other -- Yahoo News

3 Apps That Spice Up Your Love Life -- Parenting.com

Smartphone Apps for Every Possible Valentine's Day Scenario -- NBC News

9 Apps to Keep Couples Hot -- Mashable

=====================================================

Features:

-Over 1000 relationship ideas.

-Double-blind match system that allows couples to only see matches they agree on. 

-Password protection

-Unlimited updates

-Use on two separate devices

-Favorite option to allow you to star favorites and create favorite list

-Wildcard feature to allow you to anonymously submit your own ideas to your partner

-Anonymous accounts with no identifying data stored

=====================================================

With Kindu, you and your partner will get: 
- 62 daily decks for free
- Over 30 free celebration packs to commemorate fun holidays together.   
- Access to our White Rabbit store where you can buy more adventurous and specialized packs or simply unlock the daily decks if you cannot wait.  

=====================================================

In case you're curious: KINDU was created by a group of doctors who were inspired by a sexual health class in med school. The class was meant to expose us straight-laced medical students to the full spectrum of human sexuality.  You should have seen us blush! We were fascinated and embarrassed at the same time.  Talk about Eyes Wide Shut!  This made us realize the delicate nature of desire.  We first developed KINDU as a hobby back in 2008. After further research, we discovered that intimacy is crucial to a healthy love life. The purpose behind our app became connection, communication, novelty, and fun.  

With KINDU, we strive to promote a love-positive lifestyle.  KINDU is meant to incorporate the whole spectrum of what couples do. There will be some ideas you may not try in a million years, but there are other couples who want to do those same things a million times. We ask you keep an open mind and an open heart. 

Sincerely, 
The KINDU team

title: Kurz Real Estate
description:
LOCATED IN MIAMI and servicing Miami, Broward, Palm Beach and the Florida Keys, KURZ REAL ESTATE is a company founded on the idea that real estate sales and marketing must remain innovative.  Constantly finding better ways to sell homes and knowing that traditional ways have evolved into tech, but not forgetting that personal relationship trumps all.

We have built a company that focuses on culture and training, ensuring our agents are staying on top of the market and growing every minute they serve our community.  David Adam Kurz started in 2005 as a single agent and over the years he progressed into putting together a strong and advanced team of professionals.  In 2016 he took that and created a company.  A company that embodies the culture, strength, education and professionalism his team is proud of.

We opened our office on the edge of Coconut Grove on the corner of Douglas Road and Grand Ave.  6,000 sqft of storefront was turned into a conducive workspace for agents, attracting new and veteran professionals alike.

We have learned over the last decade that as a real estate professional, you need to be the best marketer known to the industry to best serve your customers.  That鈥檚 why we embody multiple avenues of exposure such as Radio, TV, Print and Public Relations.  Every agent can place your home on the MLS 鈥 this is what makes us different.  This is what makes us successful.

title: Lacoste.12.12 Contact
description:
Designed for Lacoste.12.12 Contact smart watch.

Designed for Lacoste.12.12 Contact smart watch. This app enables your watch to deliver the smart features that keep your digital essentials subtly on hand and in style. Stay connected your way 鈥 with prioritized visual and vibration notifications for calls, texts, events, social media, and more.


鈥	Select which apps you want to receive notifications from on your smart watch, and select the vibration intensity.

鈥	Set your daily step goals and track your progress by day, week, or month.

鈥	Choose which calendars you want synced to your smart watch and enable or disable calendar reminders.

鈥	Manage and prioritize contacts, so you always know when, and which of your favorite people are getting in touch with you.

鈥	Schedule times to not receive notifications on your smart watch with the Silence Watch feature.

鈥	Smart features and app, Engineered by HP - reimagining the brands you love with the smarts you need.

title: Lajumate.ro -Anunturi Gratuite
Lakai
description:
Lakai is a Torrance, California based footwear manufacturer that creates shoes designed specifically for skateboarding. Professional skateboarders (and Girl Skateboards co-founders) Mike Carroll and Rick Howard founded Lakai in 1999, adopting the name from a shortened version of a nickname Mike Carroll was partial to at the time (it鈥檚 a long, tricky story, so we鈥檒l spare you the details). 

Lakai鈥檚 first video, Beware of the Flare, was released in June 2002. Their follow up, the highly anticipated Fully Flared, was released to critical acclaim on November 16, 2007.

The Lakai skate team is: Rick Howard, Mike Carroll, Brandon Biebel, Marc Johnson, Guy Mariano, Cairo Foster, Jeff Lenoce, Rob Welsh, Mike Mo Capaldi, Vincent Alvarez, Daniel Espinoza Jesus Fernandez, Lucas Puig, JB Gillet, Nick Jensen and Danny Brady. 

Lakai is also part of the Crailtap family, which includes Girl Skateboards, Chocolate Skateboards, Royal Trucks and Fourstar Clothing.

Simply stated, Lakai Limited Footwear are 鈥淭he Shoes We Skate鈥.

title: Lake Okoboji Real Estate
description:
The SellBoji.com Real Estate App is brought to you exclusively by RE/MAX Lakes Realty and LeadCity CRM.  This free search and transaction management app was custom developed for over a year and focuses purely on providing the very best search features, easy account management, and transaction management.  The focus is purely on the consumer and the SellBoji.com app is a combination of Zillow, Realtor.com, RE/MAX.com, and SellBoji.com and combines the best features from each of those apps into one power packed app.  

Key features: 
鈥 Users can easily sign up and stay in touch with their agent, save searches, save favorites, be notified of new listings, price changes, etc, you can manage all of this from your phone or ipad, just as you can from your computer. 
鈥 Easily access map navigation while driving around looking at homes, view nearby amenities and schools, lookup assessor and tax info, easily send listings to friends, use the mortgage calculator, and so much more.
鈥 You can do much of this without even needing an account or login.  But the greatest benefits come if you sign up and create a free account.  You can easily keep track of all of your favorites, view recent searches, edit your profile, and so much more.  
鈥 The feature that sets this app apart however is the instant access to all of your transaction info.  Whether you are a seller or buyer that uses an agent from RE/MAX Lakes Realty, you can access your listing docs, your purchase docs and view all necessary data in real time to stay up to date on your transaction, and at tax time, when it's time to turn in your closing statements to your accountant, you have the same access with your phone as you do with the computer, and can easily download important documents. 

If you are looking to buy or sell in the Iowa Great Lakes, and you don't have this app, you are missing out on the easy life.  This app provides access to ALL listings on the MLS.

title: Landra
description:
Landra is the place for teens to exchange information for independence. Teens have ownership over their tasks and communicate through the app directly to their parents in Mothershp.

Here's how it works:

Parents and teens set chores within Mothershp and assign them point values.
Teens receive their list of chores in Landra.
Teens can complete these tasks based on due date and point value.
Once parents approve the completed chore, points are rewarded
Teens choose their desired reward.

Parents are happy because things get done. Teens are happy because they get to do what they want.

title: Lash Wardrobe
description:
Introducing Kiss鈥檚 Very Own Eyelash Simulation App

*NEW* Wardrobe FREE Mobile App offers a wide variety of Kiss eyelashes catering to all eye shapes and sizes.  No more worries about buying the wrong lash style for your eyes. Just snap a selfie, pick a lash style, and voila! 

Key Features

1.	Eyelash Simulator 
Browse through lash styles to select your favorite and apply them to your eyes in your selfie!

2.	Eyelash Photo Share
Show off your fabulous lash selfie by posting directly on your Instagram, FB, Twitter or other social media platforms in just one click! 

3.	Eyelash Video for How to apply
Watch videos on how to apply our KISS Lashes.

4.     KISS Family Product
Show KISS family product as Lashes, Glues, Eye and Brow Make up.

title: LDS Mobile Media
description:
Finally, there鈥檚 an iPhone app that lets you listen, read, and browse all of your favorite LDS General Conference talks and BYU speeches and devotionals!  With more than 6000 discourses from hundreds of speakers, it's all too easy to satisfy your craving for gospel enlightenment, with nothing more than your iPhone.

With LDS Mobile Media you can:

鈥⒙燫andom speech finder makes it easier than ever to find something to listen to
鈥⒙燤ark speeches and speakers as favorites
鈥⒙燰iew all available General Conference (1985 - 2015) and BYU (Provo & Idaho) speeches by a given speaker
鈥⒙燪uickly and easily share your favorite speeches with family and friends by text message, email, Facebook, or Twitter
鈥⒙燫ead the text to a speech online or listen to the audio (some speeches don鈥檛 have both audio and online text)
鈥⒙燬earch by our list of topics or use your own search keywords
鈥⒙燫eceive daily reminders to help you find time to study the gospel

title: LED Banner Display
description:
Turn your iPhone into dot-matrix LED display. It is best way to communicate if your friend cannot hear you in such noise environment or in a meeting. 

How To Use: Simply type your message and tap on "Display" ,rotate your iPhone to see full screen.


FEATURES 
- User friendly simple interface
- Color selection. 
- Speed selection. 
- No message length limits. 
- Easily save and load messages.
- Instant messages

title: Lemonade stickers for iMessage
description:
Lemonade stickers for iMessages allows you to express yourself in Messages like never before with unique, emotive stickers that peel and place right over message bubbles, photos, and even other stickers! With Lemonade you can change the size of your stickers, add spectacularly animated bubble effects, and layer stickers together with friends to create colorful, creative screens.

Offering a thoughtfully curated catalog of funny, expressive sticker packs and beautiful emoji reactions in a variety of skin tones, Lemonade turns every messaging conversation into a fun and exciting experience, curating some of the most popular stickers for iMessage.

Send cute animals, kawaii manga style chibis, food stickers, emotional smiley face icons, and happy cartoon images, including:

Noms 鈥 Pile on the pizza, bacon, fries and avocado; sticker noms for every appetite
Drumpf vs. Chillary 鈥 Donald Trump and Hillary Clinton in a literal face off for the presidency
Happy Hour 鈥 Pop some champagne or turn up with a cocktail, here鈥檚 your recipe for a good time
Caturday 鈥 the best day of the week for an irreverent coven of silly, rollicking cats
Fluffy the Corgi 鈥 see this adorable dog hop, jump, and chase his way into your heart
Pandamonium 鈥 a selfie-loving, pillow-drooling, precious, bubbly panda
Hip Hooters 鈥 a snazzy pack of sharply dressed baby owlets
Mischievous Molly 鈥 a hysterical, energetic girl and your new personal avatar
Who Gives a Fox? 鈥 an adorable fox family (though we鈥檙e still not sure what they say)
Bunilla Ice 鈥 a bratty, rebellious bunny punk who鈥檚 not afraid to cross the line

Easily share iMessage stickers with Lemonade via Twitter, Facebook, Email, or Messages to spread the love! Please note that in-app purchases may be required to unlock additional sticker packs.

Have any problems using Lemonade? Email us at support@getthatlemonade.com. We're here to help!

Some illustrations have been provided by the incredibly talented team at http://emojione.com

title: Let Go and Let God
description:
The 鈥淟et Go and Let God鈥 app helps you to give problems to God, so they can be resolved in a divinely perfect way. While you can always talk directly with God, this app is a supportive tool to help you develop the habit of giving worries to God.

You can turn any worry into a healing experience by vocalizing your thoughts and feelings to God. Once you have spoken your concerns, doubts, worries, confusions, or questions to God, Let Go鈥攖hen receive a divinely comforting message.

You'll need to give this app access to your microphone, and please don't worry鈥攊t won't record, store, or listen to your recordings. Everything's confidential between you and God.

FEATURES
- RELEASE your worries, questions, and concerns confidentially to God
- RECEIVE a healing, comforting affirmation when you 鈥淟et Go鈥
- SHARE your affirmation with others
- REMEMBER to give your worries to God daily, with a customizable daily notification

Lovingly created by Doreen Virtue:
鈥淢y prayer is that this app will encourage you to consistently turn everything over to God, and develop the healthful habit of releasing worries. Please talk with God as long and often as you're guided, and to remind yourself to Let Go and Let God.鈥 - Doreen Virtue

Doreen Virtue holds three university degrees in counseling psychology, and is a life-long clairvoyant and spiritual healer. Doreen is a bestselling author on the subject of angels.

title: Levatee - Custom T-Shirts
description:
Levatee is the world鈥檚 easiest and fastest way to get that simple, personalized shirt you鈥檝e always wanted.

What used to take 45 minutes to design on a custom tee shirt website, now takes 45 seconds from your mobile phone.

We use the highest quality, best fitting shirts; along with the highest quality direct to garment digital printing method; all made and produced in America.

We offer the best colors, best fonts and best styles so you don鈥檛 have to be a designer to get that perfect shirt.

We offer lots of fun pop culture ideas for you to choose from, but the best shirt is the one you come up with on your own.

Share your creations on Social Media, Save them for later in your own library, gift them to a friend or buy instantly for yourself.

We typically produce your shirt(s) in 1-2 business days and then they ship to you for FREE with visibility to tracking information.

Levatee securely saves the shipping addresses of you and all your friends; It also securely saves all your credit card information.  Checkout takes even less time than creating your shirt.

Make that shirt for a friend at a party and be the coolest person in the room.

Show somebody how it works on your phone and then drop the Mic.

No matter where you are or what you鈥檙e doing, everyone around you will be impressed when your make a shirt, pay for it , and ship it within 60 seconds.

We all have something to say, so鈥WHAT WILL YOUR SHIRT SAY?

Life鈥檚 short.

Bring a little Levity to everyone around you.

Levatee.

title: Life.Church
description:
With the Life.Church app, you can experience Life.Church anywhere! 

鈥 Watch or listen to messages from Senior Pastor Craig Groeschel
鈥 Download audio and video messages for offline playback
鈥 Connect with your Life.Church campus or Church Online
鈥 Follow along with the service in the app with the Weekly Guide
鈥 Request prayer, submit questions and much more through the contact card
鈥 Check-in your kids for LifeKids or check-in to serve through the app
鈥 Invite your friends and family 
鈥 Give to Life.Church
鈥 And more! 

The latest version of the app has many updates to help you grow as a fully devoted follower of Christ. Download the Life.Church app today to be part of our Life.Church community as we take the next step in our journey with Christ together!

About Life.Church:
Life.Church wants to make a lasting difference in your life, in our community, and in the world. Our mission is to lead people to become fully devoted followers of Christ. That's how we're able to make a difference, and it's the driving force behind everything we do.

We meet in physical locations around the United States and globally online at live.life.church.

title: LifeCC La Porte
description:
Welcome to the official Life Community Church of La Porte, Texas app! We count it a privilege to serve you and hope you have a great experience with us. Our greatest joy is to see people encounter God in a relevant way and discover His plans and purposes for their lives. 

We have designed this app with you in mind and we hope this will enable you to stay connected to your church family, our ministries and events. You can also give right from the app and listen to our archive of sermons. 

After you've downloaded the app and enjoyed the content, you can share it with your friends via Facebook, Twitter, or email. 

For more information about Life Community Church, please visit: 
http://www.lifecc.tv

title: LifeHack Chisinau
description:
LifeHack Chisinau - 谐芯褉芯写褋泻芯械 锌褉懈谢芯卸械薪懈械, 胁泻谢褞褔邪褞褖械械 胁 褋械斜褟 褉褟写 褋械褉胁懈褋芯胁, 泻芯褌芯褉褘械 薪邪屑 薪械芯斜褏芯写懈屑褘 泻邪卸写褘泄 写械薪褜. 袧邪 写邪薪薪褘泄 屑芯屑械薪褌 写芯褋褌褍锌薪褘 褋谢械写褍褞褖懈械 褉邪蟹写械谢褘:

袗褎懈褕邪 - 胁褋械 屑械褉芯锌褉懈褟褌懈褟 袣懈褕懈薪械胁邪 褋 锌芯谢薪褘屑 芯锌懈褋邪薪懈械屑 懈 胁芯蟹屑芯卸薪芯褋褌褜褞 锌芯泻褍锌泻懈 斜懈谢械褌芯胁.
袣褍褉褋褘 - 懈薪褎芯褉屑邪褑懈褟 芯 褌芯屑, 谐写械 懈 泻芯谐写邪 屑芯卸薪芯 锌芯屑械薪褟褌褜 胁邪谢褞褌褍 锌芯 谢褍褔褕械屑褍 泻褍褉褋褍.
袣懈薪芯 - 褉邪褋锌懈褋邪薪懈械 胁褋械褏 褎懈谢褜屑芯胁 泻懈薪芯褌械邪褌褉邪 Patria 褋 胁芯蟹屑芯卸薪芯褋褌褜褞 斜褉芯薪懈褉芯胁邪薪懈褟.
孝邪泻褋懈 - 褋锌懈褋芯泻 胁褋械褏 褋谢褍卸斜 褌邪泻褋懈 袣懈褕懈薪械胁邪 褋 胁芯蟹屑芯卸薪芯褋褌褜褞 斜褘褋褌褉芯谐芯 胁褘蟹芯胁邪.
孝械谢械褎芯薪褘 - 褋锌懈褋芯泻 胁褋械褏 薪邪懈斜芯谢械械 胁邪卸薪褘褏 褌械谢械褎芯薪薪褘褏 薪芯屑械褉芯胁 袣懈褕懈薪械胁邪.
袗锌褌械泻懈 - 胁褋械 邪锌褌械泻懈 谐芯褉芯写邪 褋 泻芯薪褌邪泻褌邪屑懈 懈 胁褉械屑械薪械屑 褉邪斜芯褌褘.
袟邪胁褌褉邪泻 - 谢褍褔褕懈械 锌褉械写谢芯卸械薪懈褟 锌芯 蟹邪胁褌褉邪泻邪屑 胁 袣懈褕懈薪械胁械.
袨斜械写 - 谐懈写 锌芯 谢褍褔褕懈屑 斜懈蟹薪械褋-谢邪薪褔邪屑 谐芯褉芯写邪.
孝械褉褉邪褋褘 - 褋锌懈褋芯泻 屑械褋褌 胁 袣懈褕懈薪械胁械, 谐写械 屑芯卸薪芯 芯褌写芯褏薪褍褌褜 懈 锌芯写泻褉械锌懈褌褜褋褟 薪邪 褋胁械卸械屑 胁芯蟹写褍褏械.
小泻懈写泻懈 - 褋锌懈褋芯泻 褌芯胁邪褉芯胁, 薪邪 泻芯褌芯褉褘 褋械谐芯写薪褟 褏芯褉芯褕懈械 褋泻懈写泻懈 胁 芯薪谢邪泄薪 屑邪谐邪蟹懈薪邪褏.
袥邪泄褎褏邪泻懈 - 懈薪褌械褉械褋薪褘械 褋褌邪褌褜懈 褋 锌褉邪泻褌懈褔械褋泻懈屑懈 锌芯谢械蟹薪褘屑懈 褋芯胁械褌邪屑懈 写谢褟 卸懈褌械谢械泄 袦芯谢写芯胁褘.

袗褎懈褕邪
孝械锌械褉褜 胁褋械 屑械褉芯锌褉懈褟褌懈褟 袣懈褕懈薪械胁邪 胁褘 屑芯卸械褌械 锌芯褋屑芯褌褉械褌褜 胁 芯写薪芯屑 屑械褋褌械! 袦褘 锌褉械写谢邪谐邪械屑 胁邪屑 锌芯谢薪芯械 芯锌懈褋邪薪懈械 褋芯斜褘褌懈泄 褋 胁芯蟹屑芯卸薪芯褋褌褜褞 锌芯泻褍锌泻懈 斜懈谢械褌芯胁 芯薪谢邪泄薪. 袛谢褟 胁邪褕械谐芯 褍写芯斜褋褌胁邪 胁褋械 屑械褉芯锌褉懈褟褌懈褟 褉邪蟹写械谢械薪褘 锌芯 泻邪褌械谐芯褉懈褟屑 懈 写邪褌邪屑. 孝邪泻卸械 胁褘 屑芯卸械褌械 写芯斜邪胁谢褟褌褜 褋芯斜褘褌懈褟 胁 褋胁芯泄 谢懈褔薪褘泄 泻邪谢械薪写邪褉褜.

袣褍褉褋褘
小械褉胁懈褋, 锌褉械写芯褋褌邪胁谢褟褞褖懈泄 懈薪褎芯褉屑邪褑懈褞 芯 褌芯屑, 谐写械 懈 锌芯 泻邪泻芯屑褍 泻褍褉褋褍 屑芯卸薪芯 锌芯屑械薪褟褌褜 写械薪褜谐懈 胁 写邪薪薪褘泄 屑芯屑械薪褌. 袩芯蟹胁芯谢褟械褌 胁芯褋锌芯谢褜蟹芯胁邪褌褜褋褟 泻邪泻 泻邪谢褜泻褍谢褟褌芯褉芯屑 胁邪谢褞褌, 褌邪泻 懈 锌芯褋屑芯褌褉械褌褜 胁褋械 芯斜屑械薪薪褘械 锌褍薪泻褌褘 薪邪 泻邪褉褌械 褋 懈褏 邪写褉械褋邪屑懈 懈 胁褉械屑械薪械屑 褉邪斜芯褌褘. 孝邪泻卸械 屑芯卸薪芯 芯褌褎懈谢褜褌褉芯胁邪褌褜 褌芯谢褜泻芯 褌械 斜邪薪泻懈, 泻芯褌芯褉褘械 芯褌泻褉褘褌褘 胁 写邪薪薪褘泄 屑芯屑械薪褌 懈 锌芯褋褌褉芯懈褌褜 泻 薪懈屑 芯锌褌懈屑邪谢褜薪褘泄 屑邪褉褕褉褍褌.

袣懈薪芯
袙 写邪薪薪芯屑 褉邪蟹写械谢械 屑芯卸薪芯 锌芯褋屑芯褌褉械褌褜 胁褋械 褎懈谢褜屑褘, 泻芯褌芯褉褘械 懈写褍褌 薪邪 写邪薪薪褘泄 屑芯屑械薪褌 胁 褋械褌懈 泻懈薪芯褌械邪褌褉芯胁 Patria. 小械褉胁懈褋 锌褉械写谢邪谐邪械褌 胁褋褞 锌芯写褉芯斜薪褍褞 懈薪褎芯褉屑邪褑懈褞 芯 薪懈褏, 胁泻谢褞褔邪褟 芯锌懈褋邪薪懈械, 胁褉械屑褟 褋械邪薪褋芯胁 胁 褉邪蟹薪褘褏 泻懈薪芯褌械邪褌褉邪褏 懈 蟹邪谢邪褏. 袙邪卸薪芯泄 芯褋芯斜械薪薪芯褋褌褜褞 褟胁谢褟械褌褋褟 胁芯蟹屑芯卸薪芯褋褌褜 锌褉芯褋屑芯褌褉械褌褜 褑械薪褘 懈 蟹邪斜褉芯薪懈褉芯胁邪褌褜 斜懈谢械褌 锌褉褟屑芯 懈蟹 锌褉懈谢芯卸械薪懈褟!

title: Light DJ Entertainment Effects
description:
Connect to Philips Hue Entertainment, LIFX, and Nanoleaf Light Panels and take command of your music & entertainment lighting needs. Customize one of over 50+ lighting effects using the app's 3 unique light controllers, or create your own custom effects. Light DJ has been used in lots of creative applications, including special effects for home DJs, house parties, stage & video productions, holiday decorations, mood lighting for bars & restaurants, haunted houses, or just to create the ultimate music listening experience in your living room. Light DJ is the #1 app for configurable entertainment effects for smart lighting.

MUSIC VISUALIZER: Create the ultimate music listening experience. The app listens to your music and changes the effects based on the mood of the song. Lights get active during intense parts of a song and flowy with softer melodies and magically change colors at just the right moment. Special controls for Nanoleaf allow you to control rotation and fill angle to match your panel orientation.

BEAT-SYNCED EFFECTS: Use the SceneMaker Effects controller for looping effects that sync to the beat of your music. Each of the 20+ effects can be customized with your favorite colors. Just turn on your lights and let the SceneMaker run all night long.

HUE ENTERTAINMENT: Using a new Hue Entertainment area you'll enjoy higher quality effects; all of Light DJ's effects respond faster and with better sync. Send waves of color across your room with the updated Groove Wave effect, or strobe faster with the Matrix controller.

EFFECT MAKER: Create your own looping special effects with our powerful Effects Maker. (Legacy Hue & LIFX only). Share your custom-made effects and effect sheets with your friends using AirDrop.

IPAD VERSION: A DJ controller-inspired design for ultimate live-performance lighting control. Configurable sheets allow you to setup your effects and colors in advance, and the push-button interface lets making rapid changes easy.

STUFF FOR DJs: Precision tempo controls allows you to sync the lights with your set. Optional automatic beat detection using your device's built-in microphone. Also supports Ableton Link and MIDI Clock Sync for syncing tempo across devices, and MIDI Program Change or Control Change codes for controlling effects. 

Light DJ is offered as a subscription service. Each subscription includes:
-7-day all-access free trial for new users
-Full use of all of the app's controllers and effects
-2 brand new Bonus Effects each month
-Continual updates to support new hardware and features
-Direct email technical support (I respond to every email!)
-For more details see lightdjapp.com/blog

Visit lightdjapp.com for support and previews.

This app requires hardware from one of these vendors:
- Philips Hue : meethue.com
- LIFX : lifx.com
- Nanoleaf Light Panels : nanoleaf.me

Your purchase will be applied to your iTunes account at the end of the trial. Subscriptions will automatically renew unless canceled within 24-hours before the end of the current period. You can cancel anytime with your iTunes account settings. Any unused portion of a free trial will be forfeited if you purchase a subscription.

Terms of Use: Subscription includes full access to the app including all future controllers and hardware support. Bonus Effects are hardware-specific and will only work with the lighting hardware associated with that effect. Each month 2 new Bonus Effects will be added to the app for lighting systems at the discretion of the developer, based on technical capabilities of the hardware and user feedback. Not all hardware products will receive new effects each month. Bonus Effects are currently being created for Philips Hue Entertainment & Nanoleaf Light Panels and will include other hardware types as the app continues to integrate with more brands and models of lighting hardware.

Privacy Policy and Terms of Use: http://lightdjapp.com/terms

title: Litter-Robot Connect
description:
Litter-Robot Connect is the first app of its kind, bringing you data about your cat鈥檚 litter box usage and giving you full control of your Litter-Robot Open Air Connect right from your phone. (This app only works with the Litter-Robot Open Air "Connect")

Use the Litter-Robot Connect app to:
- Get real-time insight into your cat鈥檚 Litter-Robot habits
- View graphs of daily, weekly, and monthly usage to keep your pet healthy
- Monitor the waste drawer level in real-time
- Receive status notifications, including potential warnings and faults
- View History to see every cycle and notification all in one place
- Name your Litter-Robot (i.e., Downstairs LR, Spaceship 9000)

Coming Soon: 
Convenient access to the Litter-Robot online store to purchase accessories

Access Key Features:
- Adjust the Wait Time with the tap of a button to extend or reduce the time between when your cat uses the Litter-Robot and when it cycles
- Enter and exit Sleep Mode so the unit won鈥檛 cycle while you sleep
- Lock out the Control Panel to keep pesky paws and tiny hands from changing your settings or cycling the unit unnecessarily

Access detailed user information to learn your pet鈥檚 litter box habits and monitor your pet鈥檚 health. Litter-Robot Connect gives you unprecedented insight into your cat鈥檚 behavior, while making it easy to change settings and stay on top of the litter box鈥攁ll without ever scooping litter again!

Requirements:
- The Litter-Robot Open Air is available with and without the Connect feature, so make sure your unit is WiFi-enabled. Didn鈥檛 buy the Litter-Robot Connect? Upgrade today at Litter-Robot.com.
- iOS 9.0 or later. Compatible with iPhone, iPad, and iPod Touch. 

Need help? Visit support.litter-robot.com
developer: Automated Pet Care Products Inc. dba AutoPets

title: Live Psychic Chat
description:
Love and relationship questions? Life questions? Career questions? Home questions? You can now chat to our live psychic chat team from the comfort of wherever you are. Our mobile friendly service puts you in touch instantly with a genuine, authentic psychic of your choice. 

Get the honest and accurate answers that you need right now. Our team of psychic readers are all highly experienced and have all been through test readings. 

Is it time to let go of that relationship that is proving to be hot and cold all the time? Is there someone else involved around them? How do they think and feel about you? Is there ever going to be a commitment? Is it time to walk away? Our live chat psychic reading team can help you with these questions and much much more.

Is there going to be changes in your career? Will you get that promotion? Who is causing you problems at work? Are you appreciated? Let us guide you today with honest and accurate answers into all of your work and career questions. Is it time to look for something else? 

Is there a move of home in store for you? Are you going to re-locate? How will things pan out for you? Your future really does matter to us and you are just one step away from getting the answers that matter to you. Our live psychic chat team are ready and waiting to answer your questions. 

For entertainment purposes only.

title: Live Spinner - Live Wallpapers for Fidget Spinner
description:
Live Wallpaper will change to static when your device is in Low Power mode. Live Wallpaper currently only work with 3D touch on iPhone 6s & iPhone 6s Plus.

Surprise!!! the long-awaited dynamic wallpaper, you can achieve beautiful animate wallpaper photo in your lock screen, be prepare to show your friends this amazing app 鈥 Live Spinner!

User Guide:鈥 
- Set iPhone Lock Screen -
1. Start up the Live Spinner app, choose any Live Photo you want, save to camera roll.
2. Go to the Photos app and select Live Photo you want.
3. Tap the Share button.
4. Tap the 鈥淯se as Wallpaper鈥 button to the Share sheet (all the way to the right).
5. Swipe and pinch to zoom to frame the Live Photo just the way you want it.
6. Press down to play the Live Photo so you can make sure the action fits perfectly.
7. Make sure the Live Photo button is selected and tap Set.
8. Choose Set Lock Screen (or optionally, Set both).
+ The Live Photo won't animate on your Home Screen, just your Lock Screen, so if you do Set Both it' more of a way to keep the visuals consistent.
9. Press on the screen to see this wallpaper animate.

**Please note that if your device does not support 3D Touch, you can only set Live Photos as standard (non-animated) wallpapers.**

Download now, Enjoy it!

Disclaimer:
Live Spinner, its designs, and all other assets included in this application are the sole property of the developer. Any sort of reproduction of this app using the assets found within this app result in legal consequences.

title: Live Wallpaper for iPhone 6s, 6s plus 鈥 Free Animated & Custom Dynamic Backgrounds
description:
*** Live 3D Touch-enabled Wallpapers for iPhone 6s, iPhone 6s plus ***

Get access to custom Live Wallpapers that will animate your lock screen and bring it to life! Select a Live Wallpaper from our catalog, and when you 3D Touch your screen it will start animating. Show it off to your friends! 

FEATURES:
鈼 Explore gorgeous Live Photo wallpapers
鈼 Browse Live Photos to find your perfect choice
鈼 See the animated backgrounds in slide mode
鈼 Save the wallpapers you like the most to your Camera Roll
鈼 Set the saved wallpapers as Live Photo wallpapers for your Lock Screen

HOW TO SET:
To set the Live Wallpaper on your lock screen: 
1) Make sure Low Power Mode is OFF 
2) Save a Live Wallpaper from the app 
3) Open Settings > Wallpaper > Choose a New Wallpaper 
4) Select the Live Wallpaper you saved 
5) Go to your lock screen, and 3D Touch the screen. 鈥

Please note that if your device does not support 3D Touch, you can only set Live Photos as standard (non-animated) wallpapers.

title: Live Wallpapers & Backgrounds+
description:
Finally, Live Wallpaper on your iPhone! 100+ beautifully designed moving wallpapers to choose from. Live wallpaper for Lock Screen only works on iPhone 6s, 7, 8 and X

From christmas trees, aquariums, coral reefs with sharks, fireplaces, candle lights, beautiful beaches and living landscapes to geometric patterns, there is something for everyone.

Swipe between the wallpapers to save the ones you would like to use to your Camera Roll. From there simply take the same steps you normally do to make regular photos your lockscreen and/or wallpaper.

How to set as a live lock screen wallpaper:
+ Simply swipe between Live Wallpapers
+ Touch the photo to play animation fully
+ If you like a particular live wallpaper, press the save button to save it to your Photo's app Camera Roll
+ To set as a live wallpaper for your lock screen press the action button and select wallpaper action 
+ For best quality, please zoom out the picture because it is slightly zoomed in by default
+ If you touch the lock screen it will play your selected live wallpaper

title: Lutron Cas茅ta & RA2 Select app
description:
Easily setup and control your home's lights, shades, temperature and Sonos rooms from anywhere with the Lutron app on your iPad, iPhone, iPod touch, and Apple Watch.
 
The Lutron App requires a Lutron Smart Bridge, Smart Bridge Pro, or RA2 Select Main Repeater and compatible Lutron products:

Smart Bridge:
-Cas茅ta Wireless light dimmers/switches and Pico remote controls
-Serena motorized shades

Smart Bridge Pro:
-Cas茅ta Wireless light dimmers/switches and Pico remote controls
-Serena, Triathlon and select Sivoia QS Wireless motorized shades

RA2 Select Main Repeater:
-RA2 Maestro light dimmers/switches and Pico remote controls
-Triathlon and select Sivoia QS Wireless motorized shades
 
Also integrates with these other smart home devices:
-Amazon Alexa
-Google Home
-Sonos
-Honeywell Wi-Fi thermostats including Lyric**
-Nest Learning Thermostat, Nest Protect, and Nest Cam**
-Carrier C么r thermostat**
-ecobee3, ecobee4, and Smart Si
-HomeKit thermostats

The Lutron app will walk you through set up with easy step-by-step instructions.
 
Features:
 
Control from anywhere
Control lights, shades, and temperature in the comfort of your home or from anywhere in the world 鈥 the office, the airport, the beach 鈥 so lights aren't left on, shades aren't left open, and your HVAC is set back while you're away.
 
Make a scene
Add personalized scenes to control multiple lights and shades together at the touch of a button. Create a "movie" scene that dims the lights and closes the shades, or make a "goodnight" scene that turns off all your lights and closes your shades as you drift off to sleep.
 
Right on schedule
Schedule scenes to happen automatically at set times of day, or based on sunrise and sunset. Turn on your porch light at dusk, turn it off at dawn, or open your shades in the morning to wake up with the sun.
 
Geofencing
Automatically turn lights on when you arrive home and automatically turn lights off when you leave.  Receive a notification if you鈥檝e left the lights on after leaving home, then turn them off right from the Notifications screen.
 
Today Widget Scene Selection
Turn on your favorite scene from the Today Widget by swiping down from the top of your device's screen.  No need to launch the app or even unlock your phone.
 
Apple Watch App
Control the lights and shades in your home no matter where you are. Whether you鈥檙e on the couch and want to dim the lights for movie night, or on the road and want to make it look like someone鈥檚 home, all it takes is a tap. And if the lights are on when you leave the house, you鈥檒l get a notification giving you the option to turn them off.  You can even close and  open your shades while you are on vacation to give your house a lived in look right from your wrist.
 
HomeKit Support
Use Siri to control your Lutron lights and shades. If your iPhone is charging on your bedside table, simply say "Hey Siri, turn off my lights." Group your lights together into rooms so you can say things like "Siri, set the Kitchen lights to 50%." App developers can control Lutron dimmers, switches, and window shades.
 
 
**Only available in some regions

title: Luxor庐 Controller
description:
With the Luxor app, you can adjust fixture intensity and color, create unique themes, and fine-tune your color palette for special occasions 鈥 right from the palm of your hand!
 
Groups
Adjust intensity and colors (ZDC fixtures only) of individual or groups of fixtures to tailor your lighting design. With a Luxor system, you can create up to 250 adjustable lighting groups that can be turned on independently and dimmed from 1鈥100%.
 
Themes
With Luxor technology, you can add pizzazz to your home to complement any occasion through industry-leading custom color creation capabilities. Design one-of-a-kind holiday displays, create team spirit for the big game, add company colors for work-related events, or simply adjust colors to match vegetation as the seasons change.
 
Color Creation
The Luxor ZDC controller provides the ability to create up to 30,000 colors using the latest RGBW LED technology. Use the color bars to select the desired hue, saturation level, and intensity for any light or group of lights. You can also create a personalized palette to easily access up to 250 user-saved color options.
 
Programming/Schedules
Create custom lighting schedules for everyday living, holidays, and celebrations. Event-based programming initiates custom themes or individual lighting fixtures throughout the night.
 
Light Assignment
The Luxor Light Assignment Module (LAM) with next-generation ActivAssign鈩 technology allows for wireless assignment of FX Luminaire LED lighting fixtures and Luxor accessories. Simply plug the LAM into your smart device, enter Assignment Mode, choose the fixture group, aim the LAM at the desired light, and you鈥檙e all set.
