title: Prayer Times - Qibla & Athan
description:
The app shows the most accurate prayer times for all provinces of the world. Keep track of upcoming prayer times with a convenient and understandable interface and adjustable notification times, never miss it. Find the nearest local mosque according to your location and Qibla direction with the compass. Follow the live side of Kaaba and easily perform your dhikr with dhikr matic at the same time.

Main features of the application:

- See the daily prayer times, kerahat times and the remaining time for the next prayer time on your panel screen,
- Find the Qibla direction for your prayers and watch Kaaba live,
- Find the nearest mosques and get the correct directions,
- See the monthly prayer times,
- List the holy days year by year,
- Perform your dhikr with dhikr matic and follow the number,
- Use tremendous gallery pictures as background, save to your photo album,
- Receive notifications for prayer times, set reminders for whenever you want,
- Follow daily prayer times, the next prayer time, and remaining days to the upcoming holy day with Today's Extension.

Do you have suggestions or requests for the next version of our application?

Contact Us:
info@mobilegion.net

Your views are very important to us. Support us with your comments.
developer: Mobilegion Yaz谋l谋m Tasar谋m Ve Bilisim Sanayi Ticaret Limited Sirketi

title: Precious - Baby Photo Art
description:
Precious is the cutest way to track your baby milestones and see your baby's development. This app AUTOMATICALLY organizes your baby photos into adorable monthly pictures, a time lapse slideshow, a photo calendar journal, and MUCH more 鈥 all with no work required from you.

Precious uses Artificial Intelligence to find the absolute best photos of your baby and uses them to create photo stories that will melt your heart.

You can watch your baby grow up with the Baby Time Lapse feature, smile at a slideshow of last weekend鈥檚 activities, or effortlessly browse older baby pictures in the Photo Calendar. Every one of your baby's monthly milestones is accompanied by beautiful photo frames & collages, made for you. Have fun with your photos by exploring the hundreds of unique stickers we have available to mark the fun activities you and your baby share. 

You just keep taking baby photos. Let Precious handle the rest.

--

Contact us:
If you have questions or suggestions, please email us at main+help@preciousapp.com

--

SUBSCRIPTION PRICING & TERMS
Baby Art is free to download. Everyone is welcome to a free 7-day trial period of the Baby Art Unlimited in-app-purchase.
- Subscribing to Baby Art Unlimited gives you unlimited access to our premium content and features
- The are monthly and annual subscription options, with prices as listed in your localized app store
- Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of your subscription
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
- Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and at the cost of the chosen package
- Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
- No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period
- Links to Your Privacy Policy and Terms of Use at http://babyartapp.com/privacy-policy and http://babyartapp.com/terms-conditions 
- Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication
- At the end of your subscription, you will be able to keep any content that your received while your subscription was active.

title: Price Chopper Pharmacy
description:
Enjoy the convenience of the Price Chopper Pharmacy App
 
Refill you and your family's prescriptions
View all your prescriptions in a list along with prescription number, dosage, quantity, fills left and expiration. You can also quickly scan the label on your prescription bottle to order a refill instantly. 

Reminders
Get reminders when your prescriptions are ready to be refilled. Get notified as soon as scripts are ready to be picked up. Send yourself reminders to take your medications. 
 
Transfer Prescriptions from other Pharmacies
Have a prescription at a pharmacy other than Price Chopper? No problem, transfer them here.

And more...
View your prescribing doctors, search for nearby pharmacies, manage your pharmacy preferences, and more!

title: PRIVILEGES CLUB
description:
Shop, scan & WIN with the PRIVILEGES CLUB mobile App!

The PRIVILEGES CLUB app is designed to give you access to tailored news and rewards from your favourite Alshaya brands. Every time you shop or dine at any of the participating outlets, you will be able to scan your app and enjoy exclusive benefits. 

When you download the app, you will be able to do the following:

鈥	Follow your favourite brands
鈥	Stay up to date on their latest news
鈥	Receive customised offers
鈥	Track your monthly and super prize draw entries and days left to the draws
鈥	Check your purchase history
鈥	Manually add a receipt that you鈥檝e forgotten to add in store 
鈥	Update your profile
鈥	Locate stores near you
鈥	Rate your shopping experience 
鈥	Tell us how you would like to be contacted 

And much more! 

Your journey with the PRIVILEGES CLUB app will be full of special moments and exciting surprises. You do not need to be a big spender to benefit. So, whether you are a regular shopper, dedicated diner or only buy when the sales are on, it鈥檚 worth downloading!

title: Property Brothers Handbook
description: A must have for home reno and design enthusiasts looking to create a dream home! The new Property Brothers app includes hundreds of renovation, design and decoration tips as well as exclusive blog posts by the brothers. You can browse thousands of high definition pictures, share design ideas, and find out more on the products used in each reno. The app鈥檚 toolkit also helps you to start planning your own dream home projects.

title: Proverbs 31 Devotionals
description:
Proverbs 31 Devotionals is a spin-off version of our Christian-themed app inspired by the book of Proverbs chapter 31. The app's main function is to feature Daily Devotional content preceded by a daily bible verse. This combination of scripture and commentary allows for deeper meditation of God's word. 

Features: 
365-Daily Devotionals(NIV Translation)
365-Verse Commentary(Matthew Henry)
Keep a Daily Journal and write Notes
Voice Recording and auto playback 
Comment section that connects all app users
Share your verses, SMS or Facebook & Twitter.  
Social media friendly

Please don't forget to Pray for us and to Rate This App!

Blessings!

title: Prynt: Instant Photo Prints
description:
The easiest way to print photos instantly (and on-the-go) from your phone is finally here! Simple attach the Prynt Pocket or Prynt Case and watch the phone print in seconds with one simple tap. Print all photos, fully editable and customizable with awesome text & emoji captions. 
 
Inside any printed photo, you can add a video. The Prynt Scan feature will reveal this video and make printed photos come to life simply by hovering your smartphone over it. The video plays perfectly on the physical photo using Augmented Reality, just like magic. 

Now Instant Photos goes with AR, so you can print and then watch again the whole moment behind the instant. 
 
鈥 Print any photo, anywhere
鈥 Print from your camera roll, favorite social networks or shoot in real time
鈥 Edit before printing (Add filters, frames, text & emojies!)
鈥 Add a video inside your photos and scan them to unlock the magic
鈥 Share the unique video experience via the Shared Scan feature

title: Puppr - Dog Training & Tricks
description:
Meet your new dog trainer! Puppr includes step-by-step video and photo instructions and a built-in clicker to help teach your dog tricks from basic obedience like 鈥渟it鈥 and 鈥渟tay鈥 to advanced tricks like 鈥渇etch leash鈥 and 鈥渟it pretty鈥. Great for both new and experienced dog owners.

Features:
鈥 Over 50 tricks taught by Sara Carson & The Super Collies (America's Got Talent top 5 finalist)
鈥 Live chat with Sara and the team to get your training questions answered (requires Puppr Premium subscription)
鈥 Step-by-step instructions with videos and photos make the lessons easy to follow
鈥 Built-in clicker makes training on-the-go easy. All lessons are taught with positive reinforcement
鈥 Track your training progress and keep track of all the tricks your pup has learned
鈥 Set reminders for your pup's potty and training schedule
鈥 Collect badges as you train and master new tricks
鈥 Support for multiple dogs
鈥 Puppr Shop that includes hand-picked product recommendations from Sara and the team to help with your training

About Sara Carson & The Super Collies:
Sara Carson is considered one of the top dog trick instructors in the world and was a top-5 finalist on season 12 of America's Got Talent. She and her dogs (Hero, Marvel, Loki, Thor, and Groot) travel North America teaching dog trick workshops and performing with a popular stunt dog team. Sara and Hero currently hold the Guinness World Record for most tricks performed in 60 seconds (49 tricks!).

In-App Purchases:
Puppr includes premium lesson packs that each come with a free lesson and additional locked content that can be purchased.

Subscription Pricing and Terms:
Puppr offers two auto-renewing subscription options:
$9.99 per month
$95.99 per year

These prices are for United States customers. Pricing in other countries may vary and actual charges may be converted to your local currency depending on the country of residence.

Your Puppr subscription will automatically renew at the end of each term and your credit card will be charged through your iTunes account unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the term. You can turn off auto-renew at any time from your iTunes account settings but refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the term.

https://www.puppr.app/privacy-policy

title: Qibla Finder - Qibla Compass
description:
Qibla Compass Pro application will help you to find the Kaaba direction quick and accurately whereever you are in the world.

If you change your location for a vacation or for a business trip, you can easily find Qibla with our application.


Using the application is really easy,

Make your device parallel to the ground and turn your device until arrow becomes green. When the arrow becomes green, your device's top side will be pointing Qibla.

To find Qibla direction, we use GPS and Compass in your device. Our application fist determines your position and direction. These values are then used in trigonmetric calculations to find the direction of Kaaba accurately.

Note : To find Qibla direction accurately, you need to give appropriate permissions to the application as the application asks at first use. And also application needs active Internet connection.

To avoid wrong results and to get most accurate results, please be sure not to use your phone near metalic or magnetic objects during measurement.

Please let us know if you have any question, suggestion or bug to report from apple@snmgames.com

description:

3gp, asf, avi, divx, dv, dat, flv, gxf, m2p, m2ts, m2v, m4v, mkv, moov, mov, mp4, mpeg, mpeg1, mpeg2, mpeg4, mpg, mpv, mt2s, mts, mxf, ogm, ogv, ps, qt, rm, rmvb, ts, vob, webm, wm, wmv.


* Extra Features

- USB Sync: Use itunes to fast sync movies to your iPad.
- WIFI Upload: Upload movies by the web browser of your computer, support ie/safari/firefox/chrome.
- FTP server: Upload movies by the ftp client of your computer, support cyberduck/filezilla.
- FTP Client: You can download files from FTP server to your iPad. 
- SAMBA Client: You can download files from SAMBA server to your iPad. 
- Dropbox support.
- Streaming: Support HTTP/RTSP/MMS/FTP/SAMBA streaming.

- Playlist: Create your own playlist, and play files continuous, you can even use  as a music player.
- Different Play Mode: Support Loop off/Loop One/Loop all.

- Resume Function: Don't worry about closing your application suddenly.

title: QuiltFab
description:
QuiltFab 3.0 will help you answer the question "How much fabric do I need to finish this quilt I'm making?" It bases the answer on some common backing, binding, border, sashing, and block fabric choices and construction methods. Just fill in the size of the quilt and its parts, and QuiltFab will compute the amount of fabric needed for making the quilt backing, binding, borders, and sashing. You can change the fabric characteristics including width and shrinkage, the backing piecing preferences and quilting method, the binding width, the type and size of 1 to 3 borders, sashing strip sizes and counts, and plain block number and size. Size and fabric needs also can be calculated for corner and setting triangles, based on the size of a reference block.  Help screens, associated with each fabric calculation, explain the choices and offer suggested values.

When you leave the application, your latest design choices will be saved,  and this information will appear the next time you use the application. Thus you can customize QuiltFab to use your own preferred fabric and quilting methods. You can also email the results to retain a record of your quilt design.

Features:

- Specify your quilt's width and height.

- Identify the fabric's usable width, per cent shrinkage, and straightening needs.

- For the backing, choose piecing preferences and overhang amount for hand, machine, or longarm quilting.

- Specify the binding width, based on your construction preferences.

- Choose between square or mitered, pieced or unpieced borders, and specify a finished width for up to 3 borders.

- Detail the number and size of alternate or plain blocks.

- If you are using sashing, specify the width and number of horizontal and vertical "strips".

- If you need setting triangles for a quilt set on point, specify the size of the reference block, and the number of side and corner setting triangles. The size of the blocks to cut and the amount of fabric needed will be computed.

- You can specify all sizes in either inches or centimeters, and fabric amounts can be shown in either yards or meters.

- Email the summary of construction choices, size details, and yardage requirements so you have a permanent record of your quilt design choices.

title: Ravit - Ravelry on the hop
description:
Ravit is a fun new app that enables you to discover inspirational patterns and yarns, update your projects and stash and browse and post to Ravelry forums from anywhere. It's super quick, and it's friendly. Ravelry on mobile has never been easier.

FIND INSPIRATIONAL PATTERNS
If you鈥檙e not sure what you鈥檇 like to make next, Ravit lets you easily browse patterns, favorite them, download and view pattern PDFs, view project photos and browse a designer鈥檚 other patterns and pattern suggestions. 

And if you want to narrow your search, choose from dozens of filters including craft, availability, category, attributes, needles, weight and more. You can even combine multiple options with AND, NOT or OR. It's powerful, but easy.

There's so many beautiful patterns on Ravelry, and Ravit helps you find them easily.

TAKE RAVELRY TO YOUR YARN STORE
Find out which yarns you鈥檒l need for a project. Check what yardage you need. Look in your stash to see if you鈥檝e already got a yarn, or one that鈥檚 similar. And because Ravit is designed to work nicely on your iPhone or iPad with readable text and buttons you can tap, you won't be squinting as you find all the info you need when you're at your LYS.

+ Search all yarns by keyword, filter by fiber, weight, attributes and many others, and sort by options including 'Most projects' and 'Highest rating'. Quickly view pattern suggestions and projects for a yarn.

+ Access your stash offline. No wireless or cell signal in your yarn store? No problem! Your stash is cached on your device so you can search, sort and view your stash offline.

SNAP, EDIT AND UPLOAD ON THE SPOT
Perhaps you're making a project on the train to work, or relaxed on the couch at home - whenever you are inspired to share your WIPs, Ravit makes it easy to snap photos, enhance with powerful photo filters, and upload to Ravelry, all from the one app.

+ Powerful Photo Editing Tools - enhance, crop, and adjust your photos before your upload and show your work in it's best possible light. You can remove blemishes, improve color balance, sharpen images and access many other pro editing tools all from within the app.

+ Optimized for Ravelry - before images are uploaded, they're resized optimally for Ravelry, so you'll upload smaller photos (up to 10x smaller!) more quickly and using less data.

+ More than just photos - you can update notes for your Projects, Queued Projects and Stash, as well as most of the other info such as yarns, yardage, skeins, colorways, and color for your stash, and progress, link to stash, rating, craft, and tags amongst others for your projects.

IT'S ALL THE LITTLE THINGS...
So why use Ravit? It's all the the little, sometimes hidden touches which make Ravit shine. Here's a few of them.

+ It's quick - if you tap on something, you go right there. 

+ Infinite scroll - smooth, continuous scrolling as you browse to find inspiration.

+ Offline - whether you're commuting underground, or you're off-grid, Ravit lets you access your Projects and Stash offline.

+ Clean, uncluttered interface - we want your work and the beauty of Ravelry.com to shine. 

+ Use up to 50%* less data in Ravit compared with your web browser. 

+ Squint less - The text in Ravit isn't made super small, and we're fully Dynamic Type compatible, so if you change the font size on your device, it'll change in Ravit.

* Based on tests of browsing patterns, projects, stash and yarns on Ravit and Safari on the same device - YYMV! (Your Yardage May Vary)

THIS IS JUST THE BEGINNING
Ravit has many features already, but we are constantly enhancing and adding more features. We have an active group on Ravelry and we'd love to hear what you'd like to see next - join in the discussion at http://www.ravelry.com/groups/ravit

Ravit is not affiliated with ravelry.com. It is an independent app, developed by a husband and wife team. You can read more about why we made Ravit at http://www.enhancient.com/ravit

Download Ravit now and hop on to Ravelry.

Available subscriptions are: 

6 months: 拢14.99/ US$ 20.99 (6 Issues) 
12 months: 拢27.99/ US$39.99 (12 Issues) 

-The subscription will renew automatically unless cancelled more than 24 hours before the end of the current period, you will be charged for renewal within 24 hours of the end of the current period, for the same duration and at the current subscription rate for the product. 
-You may turn off the auto-renewal of subscriptions through your Account Settings, however you are not able to cancel the current subscription during its active period.

Here鈥檚 how easy it is. You choose where you need a roommate and we show you potential roomies in the area. You鈥檒l be able to see the following information about each user with Facebook login.

Our newest feature allows you to search by College. The cities with the most users are in greater Los Angeles and Seattle. Our app is especially popular at Western Washington University, Santa Monica College, UCLA, USC, University of Washington and more.  RentHoop is the best college roommate finder.
 
Once you find somebody who is a possible fit as a roommate, you can favorite them or message them directly.

We pride ourselves on being the best roommate finder for an easy to use, familiar interface. 

Whether you already have a room for rent in your apartment that needs to be filled or are looking for people to rent a house you found, RentHoop - Roommate Finder can connect with you an awesome roomie.

RentHoop - Roommate Finder is available for free! Please contact us as support@renthoop.com for any support related issues. 

@RentHoop or @RentHoopApp on IG for funny roommate stories.

FAQ: Do I have to sign in with Facebook?

A: Yes, we need to validate who you are.

FAQ: Why do you need my friends list?

A: So that we can show you people who you have mutual friends with on the app?

FAQ: Does RentHoop work whether I have an apartment or house with a room available?

A: Yes! If you have a room for rent, select 'Have.' If you need a roommate and a room, click "Need."

FAQ: Why is RentHoop the best app to help me find roommates?

A: It's fun, easy to use and completely free. You can find potential roommates one swipe away. 

FAQ: What if I have a property for rent. Can I list it on the RentHoop app?

A: Not yet! Please contact support@renthoop.com for special requests. 

FAQ: What if I'm looking for multiple roommates?

A: Specify how many people you're looking for as roommates in the 'About' section. If people are potentially compatible, you may match with multiple roommates. 

FAQ: Where is RentHoop available?

A: Our is available in greater Los Angeles, Seattle and Bellingham.

FAQ: What happens if I don't find a roommate on RentHoop? 

A: Contact us at support@renthoop.com and let us know how we could have helped with your roommate search!

FAQ: Can I post pictures of my apartment that has rooms for rent if I have a room available?

A: Yes! 

FAQ: What are the other roommate apps? Should I use them. 

A: Roomi, Roomster, SpareRoom, LiveWith. No.

title: RosaryMate - Pray Holy Rosary
description:
Hey Catholics! Hey Christians!. Start praying Rosary today with RosaryMate! 
We are very proud to introduce you our Rosary application, with nice, modern design and very easy control. Just swipe to go to next bead. Or simply tap bead.
You can also tap play button and listen to voice saying prayers with you. 
RosaryMate displays current bead prayer, mystery number and mystery title. Sorrowful, Glorious, Joyful and Luminous mysteries are automatically selected by day. 
It is also possible to offer intentions - just select one of the public Intentions or add your own and start praying.
RosaryMate also includes prayers: Glory be, Hail Mary, Our Father, I believe in God, Fatima Prayer.
So Catholics, Christians, install RosaryMate and pray to our Lady!

Short description for the Rosary below:

The Rosary is a devotion in honor of the Virgin Mary. It consists of a set number of specific prayers. First are the introductory prayers: one Apostles鈥 Creed (Credo), one Our Father (the Pater Noster or the Lord鈥檚 Prayer), three Hail Mary鈥檚 (Ave鈥檚), one Glory Be (Gloria Patri). 
Between the introductory prayers and the concluding prayer is the meat of the rosary: the decades. Each decade is composed of ten Hail Marys. Each decade is bracketed between an Our Father and a Glory Be, so each decade actually has twelve prayers. 
Each decade is devoted to a mystery regarding the life of Jesus or his mother. Here the word mystery refers to a truth of the faith, not to something incomprehensible, as in the line, "It鈥檚 a mystery to me!" The twenty mysteries are divided into four groups of five: the Joyful, the Sorrowful, the Glorious, the Luminous. When people speak of "saying the rosary" they usually mean saying any set of five (which takes about fifteen minutes).

Leading child professionals, industry experts and parents have been involved in the development of Safe Lagoon with the goal of creating the most comprehensive and easy to use parental control solution help guide children in this connected online world. 

Free web filtering protects your kids from viewing inappropriate sites while the app in Parental Mode lets you monitor all your children's call, text and chat activity, screentime, app usage and location from anywhere! Safe Lagoon puts you back in control of bedtime, dinnertime study time and family time throughout the day.

With Safe Lagoon:
鈥 Real time remote management
鈥 Set up Easy Schedules: set healthy limits on App & Internet screen time
鈥 Instant Block: all downloaded Apps and Games
鈥 Monitor YouTube usage
鈥 Family GPS Location Tracking: 聽find your child鈥檚 location on a map
鈥 Setup Virtual Fences: know when they come and go from their favorite places
鈥 See the websites blocked and the searches made by your child
鈥 Manage screen time by phone or any web browser 
鈥 View Social Network Activity - Instagram, YouTube, VK & more on the way

By paring your family鈥檚 iPads, iPhones, iPods to Safe Lagoon, you have the power to manage your entire family鈥檚 screen time & device use from one powerful application.

Healthy Time Management
Safe Lagoon allows you to easily schedule game and Internet screen time for your children with our easy to configure interface. Remotely keep track of how long your child is spending on apps and how many times they pick up their phone. 

Block Dangerous Websites
Safe Lagoon is always on and working to block dangerous Internet sites on your child鈥檚 tablet or mobile phone.

Find your Child
Safe Lagoon GPS Tracker and family locator provides you real time location information of your child's device and keeps you updated on their movements. 

Advanced Monitoring
Safe Lagoon uses a unique method for monitoring your child's device so that you are sure to know where, when, who and what - automatically.

Instant Notifications
Safe Lagoon alerts you of suspicious online activities while protecting your children from predators and cyberbullies.

Remote Control by Parent App
Safe Lagoon's Parental App is your interactive window to set up and manage all your child's online activity. Remotely change their daily limit, bedtime and school time settings. From the palm of your hand!

3 easy steps:
1. Install Safe Lagoon on your child鈥檚 iOS device to create your account and set up protection. 
2. Install Safe Lagoon on your smartphone in Parent App Mode or log in from any iOS or PC browser to view your child鈥檚 activity, manage and set rules, like scheduling usage of apps or creating a location perimeter.
3. Repeat! Install on all your family鈥檚 devices to provide peace of mind and healthy online experiences for your loved ones. 

Safe Lagoon for Apple works on any iOS device, anywhere, anytime. 

Please note: We are unique!
During a blocked state icons are removed from the home screen. Due to current iOS limitations, after apps are unblocked, the icons will return to the home screen in alphabetical order and outside of any folders...but we have a solution for this! 
It鈥檚 called the Keeper and it's only available here with Safe Lagoon!

SaintSwipe is a fun LDS dating app that was created for single Latter-day Saints (a.k.a. Mormons) who want to meet and date other LDS singles in their local, nearby area.

With SaintSwipe, you swipe right or left on a person's profile when it shows up. Swiping right on a person's profile means you are interested in getting to know that person better. Swiping left on a person's profile means you are not interested and the next profile will be displayed. Swiping left or right on a person's profile is anonymous, unless you and another person both swipe right on each other's profiles. If that happens then you two are able to chat with each other. 

To really stand out, you have the option of creating a 15 second Intro Video that other people can view when they view your profile. ALL created Intro Videos are automatically submitted where they are then manually reviewed and approved before other users can view them.

title: Sex Offenders Search Lite
description:
*Featured on the Today Show, NBC October 29th: "The Sex Offender Search iPhone application is key"
*Featured on the Daily BUZZ TV Show, March 18th: "This is the app you need to know about to protect your children"

Other TV reviews for SOS:
ABC - WFTV Orlando Sep 24, 2009
NBC - WVLA Baton Rouge Oct 2, 2009
FOX - KTVI St. Louis  Feb 2, 2010
FOX - WITI Milwaukee Mar 3, 2010
ABC - KITV Honolulu Mar 2, 2010
ABC - WGGB Springfield Mar 4, 2010
-------------------

SOS (Sex Offenders Search) helps you locating registered sex offenders and sexual predators in your neighborhood, around your children's schools, friends, parks and campgrounds.

Our world can be a dangerous place. Knowledge and awareness are our first line of defense.

Are you moving to a new area? Are you buying/renting a new house? Will you be living close to any of those dangerous individuals? Are your children visiting a relative or a friend? Will they be safe?

Just activate your iPhone GPS and locate registered sex offenders in the area around you. You can also search offenders by name, by address, zip code or even near your contacts in the address book.

Offenders will be displayed on an interactive map on your iPhone. You will be able to navigate around and click on any of the locations to see the picture, name, address, and offenses of any individual you select.

Currently SOS only contains registered sex offenders located in the United States. Our database is updated once a day with new information as it becomes available. SOS requires the iPhone OS 3.0 to run.

Protect your family!

title: Sixlegs - Dog Walkers/Sitters
description:
Instantly qualified, vetted, and insured pet service care providers for your furry ones. We are a pet service business backed by the latest technology.

Through the mobile app, parents can arrange and confirm pet care appointments with just a swipe!. Sixlegs offers quality, convenience, and trust to busy on-the-go parents. 

-- QUALITY --: We are pet parents, first and foremost. Every dog walker has to walk the founder's dog and be approved by the founders & the founding dog before being hired! We have hired about 1/10th of the dog walkers who have applied to the service. All the dog walkers go through an extensive background check. We take pride in hiring the right walkers. Most importantly they are dog lovers first and foremost!

-- CONVENIENCE -: Engaging with pet service should be a breeze. We make sure you spend the least amount worrying about your furry pet while we do most of the work! Engage us with confidence as you can measure us based on what we do rather than what we say. Get a REAL TIME view of the service including a live map, when your pet is picked up and dropped off and a gorgeous instant pet report of the service. No more endless text messages and cash transactions.

-- TRUST --: Walkers will only know the exact location of the service area and the instructions to get into the home when it's closer to the time of service and are with a certain distance from your home.聽

-- INSURANCE --: Safety net. In the rare occurrence that things go wrong, we all need a safety net - Every walk is insured and every walker is bonded.

鈥 SUPPORT 鈥:聽 As pet parents, we understand that this is a high touch business and we have put in a lot of effort to get it right. Message us in the app anytime you want or email us at support@sixlegs.co (That's CO and not COM) - our founders are a heartbeat away.

鈥 REASONABLE PRICES 鈥: For busy pet parents like yourself, you will find our prices reasonable. Now the more you use our service, the more you save! We send you coupons!

title: Sleeptracker庐
description:
THIS IS THE COMPANION APP for Beautyrest庐 Sleeptracker庐 Monitors and Tomorrow庐 Sleeptracker庐 Monitors. ONE OF THESE DEVICES IS REQUIRED TO USE THIS APP.

SLEEPTRACKER庐: BETTER SLEEP
Learn about your sleep - and improve your sleep - with nothing to wear or charge!

Sleeptracker庐 is the companion app for the Beautyrest庐 Sleeptracker庐 Monitor and the Tomorrow庐 Sleeptracker庐 Monitor which makes your bed a smart bed. The Sleeptracker庐 system is the first cloud-based, non-invasive IoT sleep optimization solution powered by artificial intelligence (AI) and integrated into the smart home.

The Sleeptracker庐 app provides detailed daily sleep graphs and sleep metrics derived from accurately and continuously monitoring the sleeper鈥檚 respiration rate, heart rate, and movements throughout the night. Easy-to-understand sleep graphs visually distinguish between periods when you were in REM sleep, light sleep, deep sleep, or awake. The AI Sleep Coach delivers personalized tips and insights to help you improve your sleep every night.

AI SLEEP COACH
The AI Sleep Coach, powered by the Sleeptracker庐 Artificial Intelligence Engine, provides effective, easy-to-implement, personal sleep tips based on a comprehensive analysis of individual sleep patterns. 

RESPIRATION AND HEART RATE MONITORING
The Sleeptracker庐 system monitors both respiration and heart rate accurately through the night for deeper sleep analysis, with your data displayed as easy to read charts in the Sleeptracker庐 app. 

SLEEP CYCLE ALARM
Optionally select white noise that gently fades away after you've fallen asleep, then set a sleep cycle alarm that will help you Wake Up at the Optimal Time鈩 in your sleep cycle so you wake up refreshed and more energized.

AUTOMATIC SLEEP MONITORING
If you choose to record your sleep automatically, there鈥檚 nothing to do and nothing to wear. Optionally receive a notification in the morning when your sleep results are available and a daily email with your sleep summary and AI Coach insights.

APPLE HEALTH
Share your Sleeptracker庐 sleep data to the Apple Health app.

Sleeptracker庐 reports the following sleep-related statistics each night:
- REM sleep, light sleep, deep sleep, awake time
- Time at which you fell asleep and woke up
- Number of times awoken during the night
- Continuous respiration rate
- Continuous heart rate
- Sleep score (scale of 0-100)
- Sleep efficiency (time spent in bed vs. total time asleep)
- Time it took you to fall asleep

Sleeptracker庐 is also the companion app for Sleeptracker庐 smart beds by Simmons庐 and Serta庐 including Beautyrest庐 SmartMotion鈩 and Serta庐 SleepGPS鈩 adjustable bases.

title: smanos home
description:
THE SMART WAY TO SECURE YOUR HOME

Smanos home is the all-seeing, all-knowing smart & secure home app you have been missing. The app is the gateway to your latest smanos smart home & DIY security devices. Dream big and live smart with the smanos home app and devices now!

HOW IT WORKS

Interactions with your smanos security devices are automatically indicated on the smanos home app. The app allows you to easily access, manage and share all your smanos devices -- anytime, anywhere, at the palm of your hands. 

FAST AND EASY WI-FI SETUP

Simply connect to your home鈥檚 Wi-Fi network using the free smanos home app. The app has a step-by-step guided setup. The pairing device will provide audio and LED notifications of its status to avoid confusion during installation.

STAY CONNECTED WITH FAMILY AND FRIENDS

The app allows you to connect and share devices with your family and friends with just a few taps. Shared devices will allow other users to view cameras or arm/disarm your alarms. The app will inform shared users when alarms go off or if a family has arrived home safely. You may set standard or admin access to different users for every individual device.

SUPPORTED DEVICES

UFO Panoramic WiFi HD Camera [PT-180H]
The UFO camera has a full HD panoramic view with zero blind spots. It provides crystal clear footage through a 360掳 birds eye perspective, a 180掳 panoramic view, or a 90掳 quad view. The camera has a built-in motion detection, real-time and archived remote viewing, and cloud storage scalability and flexibility.

SmartHome DIY Kit [K1]
The DIY kit has zero wiring -- zero hassle. The K1 is a wireless, integrated smart home and security gateway, combining butler- and guard-like functions into a stack of aesthetically pleasing round discs. The flexibility of the K1 allows you mix and match compatible sensors as you see fit. The app will grow with you as your residential requirements evolve.

Smart Video Doorbell [DB-20]
The Smart Video Doorbell is an all-new addition to the smanos smart home portfolio, powered by smanos鈥檚 signature form and function as well as ease of use. When someone presses on the bell button or the built-in motion sensor detects movements, you and your family get an instant notification on your smartphones, enabling you to see and speak with your visitor no matter where you are in the house or in the world, anytime of the day.

title: Sober Time - Sobriety Counter
description:
Sober Time helps you track your addictions, stay motivated, and interact with others in recovery.

Here's what you can do with Sober Time:
- Track as many addictions as you want
- Built-in Goals with the option to add your own
- Daily motivational messages
- Vibrant sober community forum
- Personalize your addictions with beautiful backgrounds and icons
- Tons of timer options
- Track your relapses and add notes to them
- See how much money you've saved
- Share your progress
- Style your app with 15+ color themes

Accurate and precise Sobriety Tracker
Track the time you've been clean down to the second. The tracker updates in real time and you can see the seconds, minutes, hours and days tick by. With over 10 unique display modes - from total days to breaths - pick one that shows what's important to you.

Staying motivated and inspired
Sober Time helps you stay motivated and inspired by showing daily inspirational messages and setting realistic, achievable goals for you. You can further customize your goals by editing them or even creating your own. Each goal will be tracked in the app and you'll receive a notification when you've reached them.

Our community
Sober Time has a dedicated community forum where you can read or discuss anything related to sobriety. Users discuss their daily struggle with addiction, motivation, milestones, and more. You can stay anonymous and browse the forum without registering an account. Soak up the knowledge until you're ready to share your story.

Personalized experience
Each addiction that you track with Sober Time can be individually personalized. Choose from one of the scenic nature backgrounds or upload your own. Set up your own heading and change the counter to show the way you like it. Varied display modes, like heartbeats or total seconds, give you complete freedom of expression.

title: Stream-Surfer iCommand
description:
Put all your remote controls away in a box... 
Just one smart device can control everything! Easy to use, simplified control on an intuitive graphical display using a familiar smart-device interface. You can even remotely monitor and control equipment and systems.(requires an Internet connection)

Controls and monitors 
almost any type of equipment:

路 TV recorders
路 Blue Ray players
路 Lighting
路 Distributed audio systems
路 Blinds & shades
路 Climate control
路 Security systems 
路 Alarms
路 Cameras
路 Tank Sensors
..... and more

Stream Surfer鈥檚 unique programming and hardware features give it the flexibility to adapt to changing technology.

We program the iCommand app based on the type of equipment it is to control. With the right user credentials, the unique control configuration can be downloaded to a smart-device via the Internet.

The iCommand app can be downloaded for free to as many smart-devices as you like and up to 8 iCommand controllers can be operational at any time. A simple touch of the sync button is all it takes to synchronize the program with the equipment.

Stream Surfer is infinitely scalable. Additional control hardware can be added at any time. Just notify us of the type and model of equipment to be controlled, and we will do the programming. Simply 鈥渟ync鈥 the changes, and you are ready to go.

***(iCommand configuration license required. Visit www.stream-surfer.com for more information)***

title: Streeter
description:
Streeter is a one stop app for all things local. You can discover local businesses, nearby restaurants, latest movie showtimes, boutiques, malls, offers, night clubs, job listings and many more. Streeter is a win-win for both customers & businesses.

If you are near to the echoed location/place you will get push notification with number of friends or followers in your circle that has recommended, it can be restaurants nearby, food near me, jobs near me, places to eat near me and even movies,movie theater near me. 

MY WALL

Feed includes business listings, Ad postings and social activities likes Loves, comments, Echoes, Ratings and Reviews and many more appear here.Build a virtual story that grows more eclectic with each adventure!

MAP VIEW
Use Streeter鈥檚 integrated map view to see places and listings near your current location. Refine your search and find popular places. Streeter helps you find it fast! Perform a simple local search and find local businesses,local listings,job search, business directory,places hiring near me,shopping near me,food places near me,local businesses near me,restaurants near me,malls near me,outlets near me, places to eat near me all at your fingertips. 

MOVIES
See what movies are now showing in your area. Find out what鈥檚 coming soon, see show times, and also purchase movie tickets directly .You can also purchase movie tickets for your friends and attend the movie as a squad. You can also send personalized recommendations on movie theater near me. 

NOTIFICATION
Stay in the loop. Streeter notifies you of important social activities such as Loves, comments,echoes on your posts. Get notified on local businesses,restaurants nearby,hot selling movie tickets, malls near me,places to eat near me,outlets near me and many more. 

STREETER FOR BUSINESSES
Tell your customers what makes your company special. Share your story, describe your products, or explain your philosophy. Include your business in the business directory where it can be found by a simple local search. 

POST AN AD
Businesses and Individuals can post a targeted advertisement with a few taps of the screen that will be seen by people in the vicinity of their home or business.  The best part? It鈥檚 100% free!

BOOST ADS 
Improve visibility of your ads by boosting them. Connect points earned by inviting friends to Streeter,Choose from three distinct categories of promotion. URGENT ADS ,FEATURED ADS ,SPOTLIGHT ADS Get better views by putting your ad in the spot light!

title: Talk To Tucker, F.C. Tucker
description:
House hunting in Indiana just got easy.

If you鈥檙e looking for your next home in Indiana, look no further than the Talk to Tucker app! Created as a companion to TalktoTucker.com, this easy-to-use app includes everything you need for a smooth house hunting experience, including almost all of the listings in the state (not just ours).

F.C. Tucker is Indiana鈥檚 largest independent real estate firm and we are proud to bring you what we feel is the best real estate app in the market. With over 1,500 agents statewide and access to homes across Indiana, our listings are updated every 15 minutes to make sure that we鈥檙e always bringing you the latest and most accurate information. All of our information is straight from the source, meaning it comes directly from the local real estate board.

The highlight of this app is the incredibly easy-to-use search function. Search for homes using a broad variety of filters, from neighborhoods and school districts to community features such as pools and golf courses. If you鈥檙e looking for homes nearby, you can do a search by simply using the GPS on your phone. Refine your search by specifying the number of beds and baths, square footage, keywords, and more!

Everything you need or want to know about moving and living in Indiana is available at your fingertips. Tucker Realtors are your local experts, and our app gives you an inside look at communities, school districts, and neighborhoods, providing you with valuable information.

Talk To Tucker App Features:
-   Get a full profile of almost any home (not just ours) in Indiana
-   Discover local information from the local experts, including custom community descriptions
-   Access a mortgage calculator
-   Find and contact a local agent and the F.C. Tucker office most convenient to you
-   Get convenient driving directions
-   Discover photos that we鈥檝e captured for specific communities
-   Find stats such as the average age of homes and the number of properties in a neighborhood

Set up your FREE MyTucker account and:
-   Save your favorite homes for easy reference
-   Create notes and add photos to your favorite listings
-   Create saved searches and receive daily emails updating you on price changes, new listings, and open houses in the specified area

Whether you鈥檙e looking for a gated community in Central Indiana, a waterfront property, or a rambling farmhouse with a barn, Talk to Tucker has you covered. Before you know it, one of our agents will be handing you the keys to your new house and saying 鈥淲elcome home.鈥

title: TalkMor: LDS Daily Devotional Book of Mormon/Gen.C
description:
Scripture 鈥 Quote 鈥 Prompt 鈥 TalkMor!
Improve your family鈥檚 daily scripture study!  TalkMor鈥檚 goal is to get people talking about the gospel instead of just reading about it. 鈥
2-3 minute daily LDS devotions from the Book of Mormon and recent General Conference talks鈥.
鈥
Whether it be with your spouse, family, friends, or roommates, we believe effective gospel study can be facilitated through discussion 鈥 sharing experiences, insights, and testimony 鈥 with each other.鈥
鈥
And it doesn鈥檛 need to take a long time. Each daily devotional鈥檚 reading assignment is designed to be completed in 2-3 minutes, which means more time for discussion!鈥
鈥
Each daily devotional has 3 simple parts: 鈥
A set of scripture verses鈥
A quote from general conference鈥
A prompt to facilitate discussion鈥
鈥
There are devotionals focused on either the Book of Mormon (the 365 most referenced Book of Mormon verses in General Conference) or recent General Conference talks.鈥
鈥
鈥淭each one another the doctrine of the kingdom鈥 that you may be instructed more perfectly鈥 鈥
D&C 88:77-78鈥
鈥
鈥
A note to users:鈥
TalkMor is still in it鈥檚 development phase.  We welcome your feedback on how we can improve this app so that it is most helpful to you and your family.鈥
鈥
In the future we hope to design TalkMor so that it is customized based on a user鈥檚 stage in life, family situation, etc.  However, for now, questions are written in the context for an LDS husband and wife, who have children, using this for their 鈥渃ompanionship鈥 study.  鈥
鈥
Obviously this means that some of the quotes and prompts selected may not be immediately relevant to all users.  We ask for your patience with this, and we encourage you to adapt the prompts to better match your personal life situation.鈥
鈥
鈥
TalkMor is neither affiliated with nor endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints (LDS church)鈥

title: TEDxFoggyBottom
description:
TEDxFoggyBottom 2018, our seventh annual conference, will bring together brilliant speakers from government, technology, entertainment, and more. This year's event will be a full-day experience featuring live presenters and interactive exhibits centered around the 2018 theme: Fear Itself. We are looking to re-examine the concept of fear and present talks which cast it in different lights: as a hindrance, a motivator, a biological response, a source of entertainment, and even as an immovable given.

With the official TEDxFoggyBottom app, you can browse the schedule and the exhibits, learn about our speakers and even watch the livestream of the event.

CHAT WITH THE HOST

As a host you can chat privately with any of your guests. Your guests can also respond to you via text or using the event鈥檚 web link. You can also share media files like photos, video and audio in the app. 

PAY AS YOU GO PACKAGES

EASY AND AFFORDABLE

title: The Guest - Photo Sharing
description:
Getting married? Throwing a big event? Automatically get all of the photos and videos guests take at your wedding, reception or celebration with The Guest by The Knot!  No uploading, no tagging, no separate camera apps. With The Guest (formerly known as Veri), all guests need is their normal iPhone camera to join in on the photo-sharing fun.
 
Simply create an event, invite guests via phone number or email address, and The Guest does the rest鈥 for free! As soon as an event begins, The Guest will start sharing photos and videos guests are taking with their iPhone cameras in real time as they take them.
 
Use The Guest To: 
 
+ GET EVERYONE鈥橲 PHOTOS & VIDEOS - Wedding guests take 2000 pics on average鈥 which the newlyweds will never see. Since The Guest automatically shares wedding pics and videos as guests take them, you鈥檒l never have this issue!
 
+ SAY 鈥淏YE鈥 TO UPLOADING AND SEPARATE CAMERA APPS - Guests use their normal iPhone camera, and photos & videos are instantly auto-shared to everyone who鈥檚 part of an event! Guests are in-control of their content, and can delete their pics or pause their auto-sharing at any time. 
 
+ ACCESS FULL-RESOLUTION PHOTOS & FULL-LENGTH VIDEOS - Everyone can download any -or all!- of an event鈥檚 photos and videos in full resolution.
 
+ GET EVERYTHING INSTANTLY - No waiting weeks to get your wedding pics. With The Guest, photos & videos are shared in real time.
 
+ HAVE A BEAUTIFUL WEB ALBUM - Everyone can see, download and share all of the photos in the app鈥檚 event or in the web album The Guest automatically creates. 
 
+SHOW LIVE WEB SLIDESHOWS - Display an event鈥檚 photos and videos on any screen as a live slideshow with just one simple web link.
            
+RELIVE IT WITH MAP VIEW - Guests can see where they went during an event with a completely private, real-time map view
 
+ ATTEND FROM ANYWHERE - Guests who couldn鈥檛 make it to an event in person can follow along in real time via The Guest. 
 
What real couples are saying:
 
鈥淭he Guest is a must-have for every event/trip and shared moments! We used it twice. For our friends' wedding and for our wedding. So glad we had it! It was so much fun having our friends鈥 shots and moments in real time. It was like living our reception from everyone's perspective!鈥 - Melanie R.
 
鈥淲e literally have pictures with everyone who came to our wedding thanks to this app. I highly recommend using this if you鈥檙e having a wedding or any event you want lots of pics of. Loved having this!!鈥 - Brian S.
 
"Made sharing wedding pics so easy. Perfect for special days. Loved it." - Nikki M.
 
Questions, suggestions or feedback? Reach out to [The Guest Feedback Email Address]. We read and reply to every email.
 
Just so you know: 
Continually running your phone鈥檚 GPS in the background can dramatically decrease its battery life. The Guest only accesses your GPS when you鈥檙e sharing at an event. 
 
Photos: Cloudless Weddings

description:

Our incredible preppy App allows you to create your own customized monograms to personalize your texts, emails, Instagram and Facebook posts.  You can also use them for wallpapers and backgrounds! Our App creates an Emoji type icon that you can text to your friends with our "TEXT  Button." It takes you directly into your message with your adorable preppy monogram in place to personalize your text messages.  Your monograms can be in the shape of whales, anchors, and even bows.    Start with your three letter monogram, then choose your font, add color patterns, shapes, and Preppy inspired backgrounds! Once your monogram is perfect, save it.  The app creates a "My Monograms" folder in your photo library, and you can also save them within the app!  Then you can quickly and easily find and choose the perfect monogram to customize your perfect text, post, email, background and wallpaper. The options are endless.

The Free Version gives you a sample of what the full version offers by giving use a sample of several colors, 2 shapes, 2 fonts, and 2 textures which will allow you to make so many monogram combinations!                 *11 fonts 鈥 Circle, Circle with Ring, Circle with Double Ring, 2 Script, Whale Tail, Vines, Greek Circle, Greek Block available in 2 and 3 letter combinations 
                *8 Shapes 鈥 Circle, Circle with Bow, Quatrefoil Square, Quatrefoil Rectangle, Anchor,Whale,Square, Diamond

Let your imagination run wild and make your texts posts and e-mails stand out from the rest!

title: The Secret To Money
description:
The Secret to Money is an app that is designed to change the way you think about money, and to radically change the circumstances of money in your life. 

Inspired by Rhonda Byrne's worldwide best selling phenomenon, The Secret, in this app you will develop a whole new perspective on your own personal finances and potential to live a life of abundance.

The Secret to Money is a personal development program of games and daily activities created by Rhonda Byrne herself, featuring 5 powerful Secret-inspired practices that will help you develop a wealth mindset: 

DESIRES
PURCHASES
MANIFESTED MONEY 
DAILY INSPIRATIONS
AFFIRMATIONS 

DESIRES: In this practice, you create a list of 7 things you would buy if money were no object. This "Secret" list reminds you of why you want more money in your life, and what it would actually feel like to have the things you desire most.

PURCHASES: In this practice, you will change your mindset about money by spending large amounts of money in your imagination. Every day, you will receive virtual checks in escalating amounts from the Bank of the Universe, as first introduced in The Secret book.  Using your imagination, you 鈥渟pend鈥 each check on whatever you want or need, and record these purchases within the app. Currencies are localised for each country and set according to the language and location setting on the phone or tablet.

MANIFESTED MONEY: In this practice, you record all the ways that you have manifested money today - money you have received, saved, were gifted or refunded. You will be surprised by how much "Secret" money you begin to manifest every day that you are practicing The Secret to Money. 

DAILY INSPIRATIONS: When it comes to money, a little bit of inspiration goes a long way towards increasing the money in your life. In this daily practice, you will receive inspiring, financially themed messages drawn from The Secret books in order to help you change the way you think about money. Each inspiration is available to share.

AFFIRMATIONS: Affirmations are positive statements that you make to create a positive mindset and change your life on a particular subject. In this daily practice, you will read 20 unique affirmations of wealth and abundance inspired by The Secret to help change your money mindset.


The Secret to Money was designed specifically for you as your invitation to use The Secret in order to live the life of your dreams. As Rhonda says herself: 

"When I discovered The Secret back in 2004, the first big subject that I used The Secret for was money. 
 
"Like many people, I was brought up with the belief that money is hard to come by, and that you have to work really hard for money. I even had the belief that I would never have much money because my family didn鈥檛 have money.
 
"All these beliefs came from just one belief 鈥 a belief in a lack of money.
 
"So, in 2004, while researching for The Secret film, I created many different money practices and invented lots of imaginary money games in order to change my belief in a lack of money to a belief in an abundance of money. I committed to these practices, and did them every day. Considering the decades I had believed in a lack of money, it didn鈥檛 take too long for me to see the circumstances of money begin to change in my life.  And today, there is no lack in my life whatsoever.
 
"I know that whatever I can do anyone can do 鈥 and that鈥檚 why we created The Secret to Money App. The Secret team has taken my life-changing money practices that took me from lack to abundance and put them into The Secret to Money App.  The App is simple, practical, and designed to radically change the circumstances of money in your life, as it did for me."

title: The Wonder - Baby Weeks & Pics
description:
"I used this app with a picture of my daughter from birth till her first birthday and to see the change is fantastic. It's such a lovely app. Never had any problems with it over the past year either." - Mia's Mom

The Wonder visually track babies over time to see how they change, share & treasure forever!

Don't miss a moment of your baby's magical growth. Capture the daily fun and all the milestones in your baby鈥檚 life in an adorable and creative way. This app will snap baby photos with your phone and organize them into time lapse video, lovely collages, and more!

You can see your baby grow up with the time-lapse video, smile at a collage of last weekend鈥檚 activities, or effortlessly browse older baby photos. Every one of your baby's milestones is accompanied by beautiful video stories and photo artworks, made for you automatically!

The Wonder was lovingly created by a dad, who wanted to build the simplest app he could to capture his baby's milestones, and share the joy of family! We hope you love The Wonder as much as we enjoyed building it and using it ourselves.

Always, love to hear your thoughts to make the app better: instamo.team@gmail.com

By the way, App Store reviews are very helpful to us. Would you mind taking a moment to write a review? We'd greatly appreciate it. Thanks for using The Wonder!

Photo Credits:
DC Metro area photographer, Tonya Teran Photography.
tonyateranphotography.com


SUBSCRIPTION & TERMS
The Wonder is free to download. Everyone is welcome to a free 3-day trial period of the Pro Unlimited in-app-purchase.
- Subscribing to Pro Unlimited gives you unlimited access to our premium content and features
- Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of your subscription
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
- Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and at the cost of the chosen package
- Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
- No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period
- Links to Your Privacy Policy and Terms of Use at https://snapbabyapp-70050.firebaseapp.com/subscription.html
- Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication
- At the end of your subscription, you will be able to keep any content that your received while your subscription was active.

title: theCut: #1 Barber Booking App
description:
theCut is a mobile platform for barbers and clients modernizing the barbershop experience.

Barbers:
- Invite your clients & manage your client list
- Keep all of your appointments organized in one place
- Set your location and availability to get discovered by new clients & grow your business
- Accept mobile payments

Clients:
- Find your barber or discover new ones
- Book appointments & pay for your haircut within the app using mobile payments
- Keep a gallery of your past cuts to show your barber at your next appointment

 Much more coming soon...stay tuned!

title: TheDayBefore (D-Day countdown)
description:
TheDayBefore shows you the D-Day (i.e., how many days are left until the registered event/anniversary) or the number of days passed since the event/anniversary.

Let the widget automatically calculate the D-Day or the number of days since your special occasion, so that you can celebrate and never miss out on any special day!

[How Calculation Works]
Days Left:  how many days are left until the registered event/anniversary. 
Day Count: the number of days passed since the event/anniversary.
Month count : baby's age(month), etc.
Week count : count 7 day as 1 week
YY/MM/DD : view date as Year/Month/Day
Monthly: for monthly events/anniversaries
Annually: for annual event/anniversaries

[Features]
- Multiple D-Day widgets can be displayed on the home screen
- Widget size Options: Tree options (1x1, 2x1  and 4x2) available.
- Seven ways of calculating days
- Calculate anniversary (100th day, 200th day鈥) automatically
- D-Day notifications
- Various backgrounds and text colors
- Text-shadow effect (upper or lower parts of text)

[Partnership]
- Buzz Launcher

* Note
- The app may not operate if saved on an SD Card. (Do not use apps2sd.)

title: TheMLSonline: MN Home Search
description:
The simplicity of TheMLSonline.com鈥檚 real estate search, now on your phone or tablet!

Search virtually all homes and properties for sale in the Twin Cities and greater Minnesota. This advanced home search includes bank-owned and foreclosed properties, recently sold homes and more. You can search by city, zip code or GPS location.

Features:
- Full-featured map search, using the latest iPhone technology
- Instantly find homes near your location using iPhone's built-in GPS locator
- Complete & up-to-date access to MLS-listed homes for sale
- Search recently sold homes and foreclosures
- Large color photo galleries with expanded listing details
- Updated regularly with the newest homes to the market
- Search by city, zip code, price, style and more
- GPS-enabled with driving directions for easy neighborhood browsing
- Access to your personalized home search account from TheMLSonline.com
- Save favorites on your phone and share them with friends via email

title: ThinkGeek | Join In. Geek Out.
description:
With the ThinkGeek mobile app, you have the premier retailer for the global geek community in your pocket. Shop our curated collection of goods, check out what's trending in the geek world, and be entertained by like-minded people. It's basically like using our mobile site, only cranked up to 11 or over 9000, depending on your fandom. Timmy hopes you dig it.

---------------------------

Features:

Discover - Check out our latest promotions and timely content, including new products. This is your starting point.

Shop - Browse the product selection however you like - check out our exclusives, explore by category, and save some money by shopping what's on sale.

Favorites - Tag cool products you want to find again quickly. That high-end figurine for when you get your bonus. A t-shirt for when a friend's birthday rolls around. Something epic you don't want to forget.

My ThinkGeek - Look up orders you've placed on the app or ThinkGeek.com, change your password, request a return, and all that kinda stuff. 

More - Get help, find store locations, provide us feedback on the app, and, well, more.

title: Thorlight for Philips Hue
description:
Thorlight is an innovative application to control Philips Hue light system.

One of the unique features of Thorlight is the ability to know Hue lights positions within an environment and play nicely controlled animations using all lights as a whole. More than 50 meticulously crafted animations that will precisely synchronize your lights for overwhelming effects rather than random light colour changes. Enjoy your Philips Hue lights more and more every day and discover all the capabilities your Philips Hue system can really offer you.

Let make your Philips Hue lighting system a bit more incredible!

Features:

- Incredible animations aware of Philips Hue light positions.
- Simple and quick interface.
- Beautiful gradient that span all over your environment.
- Effective for a high number of Philips Hue lights.
- Communication between applications on the same network.
- Music and sounds enhanced animations with background support.
- Sequencer to create selection of your favorite animations for total automation on events.
- Today Widget integration that provides quick access without unlocking your phone.
- Apple Watch support for quick access.
- Colour matching option for lights with different colour spectrum.
- Configuration for lights, groups and devices like Hue Tap.
- Configuration lock for parental control and limit some users to specifics groups of lights.
- Reliable alarms and timers saved on Philips Hue Bridge.
- Demonstration mode to discover not purchased animation sections.

title: Time Nomad
description:
Your astrological companion and toolkit app, Time Nomad is rich with amazing interactive features and highly customisable reports. Explore astrology in clarity and style. Track personal transits in real time. Monitor upcoming changes. 

Time Nomad allows you to create an unlimited amount of personal profiles, companies and geographical locations. All data belongs to you and stored on your iCloud account. No login or registration required.

Stay up to date with your astrological transits, phases of the Sun and the Moon, movement of planets through the Zodiac. Explore natal charts of yourself and other people while learning meanings behind planetary forces and aspects. Information presented in unadorned, concise yet expressive manner to help seeing the bigger picture.

Key features include:

鈥 Dashboard with phases of the sun, the moon, retrograde planets, moon void of course, solar and lunar returns, lunar month, solar-lunar arc and many more
鈥 Widget with full chart and phase of the Moon
鈥 High precision ephemeris (NASA JPL DE-430) for all major and minor planets including asteroids
鈥 Detailed report of current and upcoming astronomical and astrological events
鈥 Astrological chart for any time and geographical location
鈥 Solar system view
鈥 Astrological chart of transits
鈥 Natal chart
鈥 Synastry and composite chart
鈥 Planetary hours including planetary hour alarm

title: Timeline - Diary and Notes
description:
Timeline helps you capture and record the important moments in your life. You can create as many timelines as you want. Using different timeline to track different events. 

Create a timeline for your dreams and achievement; a timeline for your travel plan; a timeline for your daily milestone; a timeline with your friends...

Not only the past time, you can create future event and enable notifications. Timeline is now becoming your todo list, your wish list.

Don't forget to share your timeline with friends.

[Features: ]

iCloud锛欰ll your contents are saved in your private iCloud. Data is  synced automatically on all your iOS devices.  

Privacy锛歒ou can setup passcode, Face ID and Touch ID within the App.

Share锛歋hare timeline with your friends銆  

Export and Print锛歋ave timeline image to Photo or email it to your friends. 

Security锛歍he communication between your iPhone and iCloud is encrypted with SSL. 

--
Contact锛歨ello@siliconvalleystar.com

title: TimeOut 袪芯褋褋懈褟
description:
袩褉械写褋褌邪胁谢褟械屑 胁邪褕械屑褍 胁薪懈屑邪薪懈褞 薪芯胁褍褞 锌褉芯谐褉邪屑屑褍 芯褌 卸褍褉薪邪谢邪 TimeOut 鈥 泻邪褉屑邪薪薪褘泄 谐懈写 锌芯 胁褋械屑 泻懈薪芯褌械邪褌褉邪屑, 褎懈谢褜屑邪屑, 褉械褋褌芯褉邪薪邪屑, 泻芯薪褑械褉褌邪屑 懈 泻谢褍斜薪褘屑 褋芯斜褘褌懈褟屑 袦芯褋泻胁褘 懈 小邪薪泻褌-袩械褌械褉斜褍褉谐邪 (写褉褍谐懈械 谐芯褉芯写邪 斜褍写褍褌 锌芯蟹卸械)

路 袥褞斜褍褞 谢芯泻邪褑懈褞, 褋芯斜褘褌懈械 懈谢懈 褎懈谢褜屑 屑芯卸薪芯 写芯斜邪胁懈褌褜 胁 芦懈蟹斜褉邪薪薪芯械禄

路 袪邪褋锌懈褋邪薪懈械 泻懈薪芯 褉邪蟹写械谢械薪褘 锌芯 褎懈谢褜屑邪屑懈 懈 芯褌写械谢褜薪褘屑 泻懈薪芯褌械邪褌褉邪屑
路 袥懈褔薪芯械 褉邪褋锌懈褋邪薪懈械 写谢褟 蟹邪锌芯屑懈薪邪薪懈褟 胁褉械屑械薪懈 锌芯褏芯写邪 胁 泻懈薪芯 懈谢懈 泻谢褍斜
路 袚懈斜泻懈泄 锌芯懈褋泻 锌芯 胁褋械屑 胁芯蟹屑芯卸薪褘屑 屑械褋褌邪屑 懈 褋芯斜褘褌懈褟屑
路 袙褋褟 懈薪褎芯褉屑邪褑懈褟 泻械褕懈褉褍械褌褋褟 写谢褟 锌芯胁褌芯褉薪芯谐芯 懈褋锌芯谢褜蟹芯胁邪薪懈褟 胁 褑械谢褟褏 褝泻芯薪芯屑懈懈 褌褉邪褎懈泻邪

袙 写邪薪薪褘泄 屑芯屑械薪褌 胁 锌褉芯谐褉邪屑屑械 锌褉械写褋褌邪胁谢械薪邪 懈薪褎芯褉屑邪褑懈褟 褌芯谢褜泻芯 懈蟹 袦芯褋泻胁褘 懈 小邪薪泻褌-袩械褌械褉斜褍褉谐邪. 袙 褋泻芯褉芯屑 胁褉械屑械薪懈 褌邪泻 卸械 写芯斜邪胁褟褌褋褟 懈 写褉褍谐懈械 谐芯褉芯写邪, 胁 泻芯褌芯褉褘褏 胁褘锌褍褋泻邪械褌褋褟 卸褍褉薪邪谢 TimeOut 鈥 袨屑褋泻, 袧芯胁芯褋懈斜懈褉褋泻, 袣褉邪褋薪芯褟褉褋泻 懈 孝褞屑械薪褜.

孝邪泻 卸械 胁 褋谢械写褍褞褖械泄 胁械褉褋懈懈 锌谢邪薪懈褉褍械褌褋褟 写芯斜邪胁懈褌褜 褉邪蟹写械谢褘 孝械邪褌褉, 袙褘褋褌邪胁泻懈 懈 袦芯写邪.

title: Tinder
description:
With 30 billion matches to date, Tinder庐 is the world鈥檚 most popular app for meeting new people. Think of us as your most dependable wingmate鈥攚herever you go, we鈥檒l be there. If you鈥檙e here to meet new people, expand your social network, meet locals when you鈥檙e traveling, or just live in the now, you鈥檝e come to the right place. We鈥檙e called 鈥渢he world鈥檚 hottest app鈥 for a reason: we spark more than 26 million matches per day. How many dating apps do that?

Match. Chat. Date. Tinder is easy and fun鈥攗se the Swipe Right鈩 feature to Like someone, use the Swipe Left鈩 feature to pass. If someone likes you back, It鈥檚 a Match! We invented the double opt-in so that two people will only match when there鈥檚 a mutual interest. No stress. No rejection. Just tap through the profiles you鈥檙e interested in, chat online with your matches, then step away from your phone, meet up in the real world and spark something new.

Now, let鈥檚 get started. And remember, when in doubt, Swipe Right. Trust us, the more options you have, the better-looking life becomes. 

Welcome to Tinder鈥攖he largest, hottest community of singles in the world. Don鈥檛 be shy, come on over.

MORE FEATURES? THAT鈥橲 A PLUS

Upgrade to Tinder Plus庐 for premium features, including: Unlimited Likes so you can use the Swipe Right feature to your heart鈥檚 content, Passport to chat with singles anywhere around the world, Rewind to give someone a second chance, one free Boost per month to be the top profile in your area for 30 minutes, and additional Super Likes to stand out from the crowd.

GET THE GOLD TREATMENT

Upgrade to Tinder Gold鈩 for a first-class experience: Passport, Rewind, Unlimited Likes, five Super Likes per day, one Boost per month, and more profile controls. But wait, it gets better. Save time and aimless searching with our Likes You feature, which lets you see who likes you. Think of it as your personal Tinder concierge鈥攁vailable 24/7鈥攂ringing all of your pending matches to you. Now you can sit back, enjoy a fine cocktail, and browse through profiles at your leisure. Goodbye search fatigue. Hello #GoldLife

-----------------------------------

If you choose to purchase Tinder Plus or Tinder Gold, payment will be charged to your Google Play account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in the Play Store after purchase. Current Tinder Plus subscription price starts at $9.99 USD/month, and one-month, 6-month and 12-month packages are available. Current Tinder Gold subscription price starts at $14.99 USD/month, and one-month, 6-month and 12-month packages are available. Prices are in U.S. dollars, may vary in countries other than the U.S. and are subject to change without notice. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period. If you don鈥檛 choose to purchase Tinder Plus or Tinder Gold, you can simply continue using Tinder for free.

All photos are of models and used for illustrative purposes only.

Privacy: https://www.gotinder.com/privacy
Terms: https://www.gotinder.com/terms

title: Titan Juxt
description:
Elegant designs with a modern technological twist. The Titan JUXT timepiece blends impeccable design & craftsmanship with innovative modern technology. It makes life easier by having all that is important to you right on your wrist. With notifications, alerts and much more, this timepiece lets you stay connected always.

Titan JUXT comes in 3 variants - steel, black with rose-gold, and titanium.

title: TJC-IA-525D
description:
This is a free version app published by the International Assembly of the True Jesus Church. It contains 525 offline hymns.

The TJC-IA App serves as a tool to cultivate your spirituality by singing praises to God, listening to and studying the Word of God. Also it is able to store your favorite hymns and audio sermons for listening later.

This App comes with both English and Traditional Chinese versions by selecting a language in the Settings page. The initial default language is English-US.

title: T-Mobile FamilyMode
description: Finally, a tool that simplifies parenting in the digital age. FamilyMode is the all-in-one-solution that can help you manage your family鈥檚 online habits across devices and network connections. From pausing Internet access for dinner, to rewarding good grades with more screen time, FamilyMode helps make digital parenting easier.

title: T-Mobile Tuesdays
description: Time to get the thanking you deserve! We鈥檙e giving our customers great stuff, every week, just for being with T-Mobile. This is T-Mobile Tuesdays鈥攏o strings attached, no hoops to jump through. Just the best stuff from some of your favorite brands.

title: TN Farm Bureau Member Savings
description:
Tennessee Farm Bureau members enjoy private access to thousands of discounts on everything from pizza and the zoo, to movie tickets, oil changes and car rentals!

Our Top Features Include:

PERK ALERTS*
Get push notifications on your phone when you are within 1 mile of a nearby offer

LOCAL & NATIONAL DISCOUNTS
With private access to corporate rates and thousands of discounts across the state and more, you'll never be far from savings!

NEARBY OFFERS
Discover offers within 10 miles of your current location using geo-aware technology.

MOBILE COUPONS
Show & save mobile coupons provide instant in-store discounts at nearby restaurants and retailers.

MOVIE SHOWTIMES & TRAILERS
Conveniently plan your next movie night with integrated showtimes and digital eTickets on demand.

ABENITY STORE
Save up to 40% at over 300 popular theme parks and attractions with no hidden fees and eTickets on-demand.

PERKS 101
Integrated support features and video tutorials make it easy for you to get the most from your perks program.

* Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

title: Today's Parent My Family
description:
This free app is a personalized guide to your child鈥檚 age and stage from Today鈥檚 Parent, Canada鈥檚 most trusted parenting brand. Whether you鈥檙e pregnant, a new parent to a baby, or an experienced mom or dad, get all the daily tips, recipes, developmental advice and health information you need to raise a happy, healthy family. The Today鈥檚 Parent My Family app gives you a customized, always-updated newsfeed for each pregnancy and child鈥攋ust enter your due date or your kid鈥檚 birth date to get started.
 
Features include:
- Personalized content based on the due date or the age of your child. You can easily track multiple children.
- Gorgeous Storybooks for collecting those amazing family moments using your pictures and videos. You can also add quotes and photo captions. Then share your digital scrapbook with family and friends.
- Trackers that help you record your baby鈥檚 naps and record breastfeeding and bottle feedings. 
- A potty training tool that makes toilet training fun and rewarding for toddlers and preschoolers.
- The Baby Namer tool to help you find just the right baby name.
- How-to videos on recipes, crafts, baby care and more.
- Our social media feeds, all integrated into your personalized stream.

title: Toilet Finder
description:
NEW EDITION of the reference application to 150,000 toilets!

Find every toilet nearby in an instant! More than 150,000 toilets listed for free!

QUICKLY FIND A NEARBY TOILET!
An application as practical and simple as saying ""hello!"" to find a toilet nearby. Toilet Finder can help you in every situation, in any country in the world! Find toilets that are specifically free to use, those accessible to handicapped persons, and even those given 5 STARS by our users.

THANK YOU!
Thanks for joining the large Toilet Finder mutual assistance community! As of today, there are HUNDREDS OF THOUSANDS of contributors, adding new public toilets and notifying us when public toilets close!

FREE APP
Toilet Finder will always be free for its community of users.

Contact us to tell us what you think. We are here to help and to meet your needs. Send your comments through the email address support-toilet@betomorrow.com

title: Toilet Rush 琛濆粊
description:
Toilet Rush is the ultimate toilet guide for Hong Kong. No matter you are a local or tourist, Toilet Rush can always let you know toilets nearby!

Functionality includes:
- Find toilets with no restrictions, completely free and within walking distance!
- Advanced search on district and toilet facilities!
- Found a toilet not being listed? Let us know by submitting the toilet information to us via the App!
- View ratings of toilets before you decide which one to go, and submit a comment if you think it's too nasty!

Note:
- Although the app supports offline mode, it will require internet connection upon your first launch. Roaming data-charge may occur if you are a tourist using mobile internet. So it's recommended to use Wi-Fi whenever possible.
- This app only shows toilets within Hong Kong.

title: Tommy Hilfiger TH24/7
description:
Supercharge your TH24/7, the new smartwatch from Tommy Hilfiger. Customize notifications, fitness tracking, time zones and more to make it exclusively yours.

鈥 Select which apps you want to receive notifications from on your smart watch, and select the vibration intensity.

鈥 Set your daily step goals and track your progress by day, week, or month.

鈥 Choose which calendars you want synced to your smart watch and enable or disable calendar reminders.

鈥 Manage and prioritize contacts, so you always know when, and which of your favorite people are getting in touch with you.

鈥 Schedule times to not receive notifications on your smart watch with the Silence Watch feature.

鈥 Select up to five different time-zone locations to show on display on your watch screen.

鈥 Choose between a 12hr or 24hr time format to display on your watch screen.

鈥 Smart features and app, Engineered by HP - reimagining the brands you love with the smarts you need.
