title: TOSHIBA Smart AC
description:
With the Toshiba Smart Air App, you can use all functions of your air conditioner and control it from wherever you are, either at home or in traffic on your way there when you want to get home to a comfortable environment. Check your Toshiba air conditioner for compatibility.
1. Control your air conditioner in an easy and intuitive way with your smartphone.
2. Use our cloud service to control your room air conditioner from anywhere with your login and password 鈥 inside your home or business network or outside with any internet connection.
3. All functions of your remote control are available, including basic and advanced setup.
4. Exclusive Sleep Curve setup: customized overnight temperature settings according to your preferences.
5. Exclusive Scheduling setup: customize your air conditioner to turn on and off according to your schedule.
For more information about usability and compatibility, please refer to your product鈥檚 user manual.
developer: GD Midea Air-Conditioning Equipment Co., Ltd.

title: Toyota Entune
description:
Entune鈩 App Suite is an in-car multimedia experience that keeps you and your Toyota connected.
Entune鈩 App Suite is a collection of popular applications and data services integrated with select 2012 and newer Toyota vehicles (excluding vehicles equipped with Entune鈩 App Suite 3.0). Entune鈩 App Suite is included with your vehicle, at no additional or annual charge. Once the phone is connected to the vehicle using Bluetooth庐 wireless technology, some services may be operated by voice recognition, depending on the capabilities of your vehicle. Entune鈩 App Suite for Prius Plug-in/Prime Hybrid Advanced model, RAV4 EV, and Mirai also includes Remote Charge Management, Charge/Hydrogen Station Locator, Remote Climate, Vehicle Finder and Eco Dashboard. Access to Prius Plug-in/Prime or EV apps requires an active Safety Connect庐 subscription. Please visit Toyota.com/safety-connect for details. 

Always drive safely and obey traffic laws. Apps/services vary by phone carrier and are subject to change. Data charges may apply. See Toyota.com/entune for details.

title: Toyota Owners
description:
Take your Toyota ownership to the next level. Whether you're a new or current owner, the Toyota Owners app will help you get the most out of your vehicle.

The new Toyota Owners app is filled with vehicle-specific information and provides resources to answer most of your vehicle questions. Stay connected with product features and tips to help you understand everything about your Toyota. With videos and explanations, this app is designed to help you maximize your Toyota ownership experience.

The Toyota Owners app also provides easy access to model-specific information on your smartphone any time you want and syncs automatically whether you access Toyota Owners from your desktop or smartphone. Key features of the app include:

 - Locate dealer service offers
 - View and keep track of service history records
 - Store photos of your registration and insurance documents
 - Submit roadside assistance requests
 - Search Owner鹿s Manuals, warranty information and scheduled-maintenance guides
 - Understand what your dashboard is telling you 颅see indicators associated with your vehicle

Now you can become an expert on the Toyota you drive and enjoy it even more.

Let's Go Places.

title: Transformation App
description:
The Transformation App features content from our Pastor Micheal Todd, who leads Transformation Church based in Tulsa, Oklahoma. 

Transformation Church exists to Re鈥Present God to the lost and found for transformation in Christ. We believe that using technology we can reach more people and equip them with resources that will help them live a transformed life. This app provides access to life-changing sermons, upcoming events and relevant information about Transformation Church.

title: Trusted Child Care
description:
Instantly find and book vetted babysitters and nannies - Rates start at $15/hr. Trusted is the fastest and most convenient way to secure a qualified and heavily vetted child care provider when and where you need one - with coverage currently in the San Francisco Bay Area and New York.

Enter the location, date, and time you need child care to view available providers. Select and book the perfect provider for your family, check-in during the bookings, and rate your provider to help us maintain and enhance service quality.

Why Trusted?
鈥  Experienced and vetted child care providers. All Trusted providers are thoroughly background and referenced checked, as well as CPR certified and up-to-date with immunizations. 
鈥  Same day child care availability. Babysitter cancel for the evening? Existing coverage suddenly unavailable? Child too sick to go to school or daycare? In minutes, parents can review and select an amazing provider for same day, next day, or next week coverage.
鈥  Monitor in-progress bookings. Parents can message their provider, watch a live in-home video feed, and view the location of their child on a map 鈥 all from within the app.
鈥  Child care providers are Trusted employees. Trusted handles payroll taxes and has secured comprehensive liability insurance. Trusted continuously reviews and acts on comments to ensure extremely high levels of family and child care. 
鈥  24/7 customer service and money-back guarantee. If you are not 100% satisfied with your experience, we will refund your money.

Call us at 844-987-8783 or email us at support@usetrusted.com with any questions.

title: TryDate - #1 Online Dating App
description:
Connect like never before!

The concept is easy, simply navigate between profiles around your area, decide who you like, and a match will be created if that same person likes you back. You and your match won鈥檛 be able to see each other鈥檚 profile or know who you are talking to except that you鈥檝e both liked each other. Chat and interact to gradually reveal yourself and the person behind your match. Giving a chance to learn about each other鈥檚 personality before looks.

Search Profiles

Navigate between profiles around your area or at a preferred location. Liking a profile will potentially become a match if the same user likes you back, disliking a profile will better help us understand and display the type of profiles you may be interested in.

Match up and Chat

Matches are created when a user you had previously liked and were interested in, had liked you back. You and your match won鈥檛 be able to see each other鈥檚 profile or know who you are talking to except that you鈥檝e both liked each other. Chat and interact to gradually reveal yourself and the person behind your match. Giving a chance to learn about each other鈥檚 personality before looks.

Profile Revealed

When profile is revealed, you and the person you had originally liked, matched up, and interacted with, can finally view each other鈥檚 profile and gallery images. 

Extra Features

- Send direct messages to other profiles without waiting for a match to be created (limited every 24h). 
- Revise or unsend chat messages when needed.
- Signup without a Facebook account or unlink Facebook from your account at anytime.
- We run many promotions in Miami, Fort Lauderdale, and Boca Raton (Florida). Upcoming 2018 promotions will soon server in Houston (Texas), New York, Ohio, California, London (UK), and India. Stay tuned as we constantly gain more profiles in these areas

No matter where you are, your vehicle is never far away with the Uconnect庐 App. Take advantage of the following services designed to make your life easier鈥 right from the palm of your hand! Also, this universal app replaces both the Uconnect Access and SiriusXM Guardian apps.

With this app, owners of vehicles with Uconnect Access or SiriusXM Guardian are able to:
- Lock or unlock your car from virtually anywhere*
- Start your car & cancel start remotely*
- Flash the lights & sound the horn to help find your car*
- Locate your car on a map using Vehicle Finder聽
- Send a destination to your car鈥檚 navigation system using Send & Go[1]

* Compatible with most smartwatches

You can log in to the app using the same username鈥 and password that you used when registering your Uconnect System.

What can we help you with? Contact us directly from the app. Simply select Help in the main menu and then select Send Feedback. You can also push the ASSIST button on your rearview mirror to speak with a representative.

Compatible with the following vehicles:聽
- 2015 鈥 2017 Chrysler 200

Vehicle must be properly equipped with compatible Uconnect system. Vehicle must be registered for Uconnect Access or SiriusXM Guardian fulfilling all registration and subscription requirements. Vehicle must be located within the 48 contiguous United States, plus Alaska and Hawaii. Also, vehicle must have an active and usable cellular connection.
[1] Send & Go requires Uconnect Navigation. Remote Vehicle Start not available on all vehicles. You are responsible for using remote features in accordance with any laws, rules, or ordinances in effect in your vehicle鈥檚 location.

title: unGlue Kids
description:
unGlue Kids is a free app designed especially for kids and teens to learn healthier screen time habits and manage their own Internet time set by their Parents in the unGlue Parents App. 

**BEFORE DOWNLOADING UNGLUE KIDS: Be sure to first download unGlue for Parents. unGlue Kids will not work without unGlue for Parents.** 

The app empowers kids to manage their screen time with these features:
- Daily Internet Schedules
- Entertainment Time Limits sets usage limits for apps and games like YouTube, Snapchat, Instagram, Clash of Clans, Minecraft and much more
- Chores for Time
- Steps4Time allows your kids to earn Entertainment Time with their daily steps 
- Daily Activity Reports
- Bank any unused time for later in the Time Bank

Desperate to end screen battles and get your kids off their electronic devices? unGlue Kids is an app designed especially for children and teens to learn healthier online habits and manage their own internet time. Here鈥檚 our pact to you - unGlue will help improve inter-familial relationships and prepare your kids for a lifetime of technology and time management. 

unGlue Parents for iPhone:
https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/unglue/id1129017998

More than a parental control app, unGlue Kids is based on the breakthrough idea that parents and children should agree on the right amount of screen time BEFORE trying to enforce rules around it. unGlue Kids sets a simple schedule and lets kids budget their time and even allows them to request more time. The result? Zero surprises and better time management skills. 

unGlue enables kids to:
- See how much screen time they鈥檝e been allotted and track their usage, down to the minute
- See their daily schedules for screen time so they can plan their day accordingly
- Know when they are almost out of Entertainment Time
- Ask their parents for more time in exchange for completing chores and other tasks
- Rollover unused screen time minutes to use for another day 
- Treat screen time almost like cash by giving them the ability to earn and save minutes, therefore teaching them to value their time better
- Earn more time through being active & going on walks, jogs or runs

Our solution is designed to be easy to use and easy to set up. Download the Parents App app and follow the instructions to connect your family鈥檚 devices in minutes. It works everywhere your children go 鈥 at home, in the car, or when they鈥檙e out with friends. It works with any device, so you can set limits on smartphones, TVs, tablets and gaming consoles.

unGlue's Steps4Time feature integrates with Apple's HealthKit to track kids' steps over the course of the day. Steps are converted into entertainment time for kids' use, keeping your family happy, healthy and active.

We recommend that you use unGlue to:
- Teach your children important time management skills
- Create flexible boundaries for screen time that give children more freedom to make their own decisions
- Reinforce spoken or written family rules for screen time and Internet use
- Establish a 鈥淔amily Media Plan鈥 as recommended by the American Academy of Pediatrics
- Reward your children for building healthier viewing habits and motivating them to make better choices on their own
- Help your younger children learn how to handle their first electronic devices
- Guide your older children and teens to balance screen time with family time
- Set schedules for dinner, homework, and bedtime since children thrive on established routines
- Encourage an active lifestyle by earning more time through steps.

For support, please contact support@unglue.com

Got a question? Read our FAQs at http://www.unglue.com/faqs

title: VBikes
description:
Watch our instructional video here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=v1b4Axogqeg 
1. Sign Up: the app from iTunes store. Open the app on your phone.
Sign up with your phone number. When you input your phone number a six-digit code will be sent to your phone. Enter the code and you will enter the app.
2. Find: Look around on the map to find the closest VBike to you.
3. Unlock: Approach a VBike and tap start in your app. Hold your phone near the lock while the app scans the bike. Wait for the app to unlock the app automatically.
4. Ride: Go from A to B with VBikes.
5. Lock and go: When you finish, responsibly park and manually lock the VBike. Your ride will end and the next user can find the VBike. VBikes app tracks displays the distance traveled, riding time, calories burned and carbon saved.


Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life

title: Viper SmartStart
description:
Start, locate and control your car from virtually anywhere with your iPhone, or Apple Watch! 

鈥淢aking the cloud-connected car a reality鈥 
- Edmunds.com

"The coolest thing at the Consumer Electronics Show"
- CNBC

"Without a doubt, one of the coolest apps I've ever seen"
- GIZMODO

The Viper brand created the connected car category for the automotive aftermarket with the launch of Viper SmartStart in 2009. With the release of the 5.0 app and launch of Viper SmartStart Pro devices, connecting with and controlling your vehicle is faster and easier than ever.

- Add a Viper SmartStart module to the Viper system in your car so you can start, lock and unlock your car from virtually anywhere. Receive alerts if your car alarm goes off. 
- Add a Viper SmartStart GPS module instead, and you can also locate your car and get notifications if your car is speeding or goes where it's not supposed to go. 
- Viper SmartStart Digital Systems provide the ultimate connected car experience, including engine status with runtime display, and other feedback directly from the vehicle databus. 
- Want to protect an offroad vehicle, watercraft or other specialty vehicle? Now Viper Powersports GPS ultra-low current systems can be added to your SmartStart app. Disable the starter, locate your vehicle, or get alerts if someone moves one of your powersports vehicles. 

Are you tired of carrying around another clunky remote control on your keychain, or finding yourself out of range when you really need to warm up or cool down your car before getting in? Now you can securely remote start, lock/unlock, or find your car just by pushing a button on your iPhone, iPad or iPod Touch. 

Viper SmartStart 4.0 gives you fingertip control over the following features of your Viper remote start or security/remote start system:

- Lock/arm
- Unlock/disarm
- Remote car starter
- Trunk release
- Panic
- Aux channels

Viper SmartStart GPS lets you locate your vehicle or get notified via alerts if your kids go somewhere they aren鈥檛 supposed to, or drive unsafely. 

How do you get Viper SmartStart? Just follow these three simple steps:

1) Download the free Viper SmartStart app
2) Get SmartStart installed in your car (see viper.com/smartstart for more information and where to buy Viper SmartStart). 
3) Set up your SmartStart account, and start using your SmartStart system. 

That鈥檚 all there is to it!
 
Viper SmartStart also includes membership in the Viper Motor Club, providing convenient flat rate 24/7 access to our nationwide roadside assistance network. Just press a button in the app to get connected for towing due to breakdown or accidents, or assistance with a dead battery or flat tire. 

Latest features:

- Convenient widget provides quick access to sending commands

- Two new dashboards added that allow you to pick the layout and features most important to you

- Enhanced remote start feedback: the app confirms the command and then follows it up a few moments later to let you know if the engine is running, or stopped (digital systems only). The details are provided right on the dashboard too, no need to check your status page all the time.

- Enhanced command feedback: Now when you send a command to your SmartStart system, the app provides the details for the command right on the dashboard and keeps them there in case you forget and want to check back later to confirm what happened. Doors locked at 8:30AM? Check! (all systems)

FAQ's:
- Is my car secure when I remote start it? Yep, we've been doing this a long time. The car is started, but only you can drive it away. 
- Can I control all of my cars with the same app? You bet, just install Viper SmartStart systems in your other vehicles and they will show up in the app automatically. 
- What is Viper Motor Club? It's our roadside assistance program that is included with every SmartStart Secure service plan (requires user to sign up via mysmartstart web site).

https://www.mysmartstart.com

- Remember where you parked your vehicle.

SAFETY:
- Turn the entire lighting kit into RED color when you brake.

REQUIREMENTS:
XKchrome controller or light system is required for using this app.

DEVICE COMPATIBILITY:
- iPhone: iPhone 4s, iPhone 5, iPhone 5c, iPhone 5s, iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus, iPhone 7, iPhone 7 Plus.
- iPad鈥: iPad (3rd gen), iPad (4th gen), iPad Air, iPad Air 2, iPad mini, iPad mini 2, iPad mini 3, iPad Pro
- iPod touch鈥: iPod touch 5th gen
鈥: "Find my vehicle" feature works better with devices equipped with GPS.

DISCLAIMER:
Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.  To provide best user experience, "find my vehicle" feature only activates the GPS in the background for about 10 seconds when the phone is disconnected from the controller.  The power consumption is similar to opening the Maps App briefly to find your current location.  You can also turn off this feature at any time.

title: Your Hunting App
description:
Your Hunting App is a smartphone app that uses your phone's GPS to sort through our custom database to tell you what鈥檚 in season in your specific area. 

You will see the following key information after you touch the crosshairs:
The open season and when it opened and when it will close, 

What weapon you can use in each season

You will see if the season is open for Male and Femail or just Male or just Femail

The Sunrise and Sunset for that specific day

We also have added a Comments field for additional information that may be useful 

Your Hunting App currently supports Big game and Migratory birds in Virginia and Big game in North Carolina. We are working on adding other states so; please follow us on Facebook and on our website as we will announce new states as they are made available.
We have developed the app specifically for Deer, Bear and Turkey in the "Big Game" section and Waterfowl and Webless Migratory Gamebirds in the "Migratory Birds" section. We have included indicators for the weapon that can be used to hunt in the specific season.  These include Firearms, Archery and Muzzleloader.

Special features include:

All you have to do is Touch the crosshairs in the center of the screen to see the current open seasons for your area.

Calendar screen, allows you look to see the open seasons for a specific date, and with our current release you now can look at other states and hunting zone by touching the crosshairs at the top right of the calendar screen.

Seasons screen, allows you to look at the fall and spring seasons for a specific state and hunting zone for Big Game and. Migratory Birds.

Social screen, allows you to upload pictures of your harvest and post to social media.

title: ZenScreen - Limit Screen Time
description:
Apps and devices are addictive. ZenScreen helps you regain control by letting you track screen time and set sensible rules to limit app and screen use for yourself and your kids.

ZenScreen works great for individuals as well as parents with kids (parental controls).

ZenScreen learns from your app use, monitors unhealthy usage, suggests breaks, and intelligently restricts access to apps in evenings and early mornings.

* SCREEN USAGE: 
Know how long you or your kids use the screen. Note: app time tracking works automatically without the need to upload screenshots daily.

* TIME BY CATEGORY: 
See how many minutes are spent each day on productive vs entertainment apps. Find the perfect time balance that works for you.

* SMART MORNINGS: 
Quickly check your phone for 10 minutes in the morning and then get a 20-minute break automatically to begin your day.

* CALM NIGHTS: 
Set a healthy bedtime schedule (e.g. 9pm to 7am) to stop using apps before bedtime, ending all-night video marathons or endless social media scrolling. A good night鈥檚 rest leads to improved health and happiness. 

* ZEN BREAKS: 
Beat social network addiction by taking suggested mini-breaks throughout the day.

* DAILY TIME LIMIT: 
Set a digital allowance for entertainment apps (like social media, video, and games) and ZenScreen will help you and your kids stay within that limit (e.g. 90 minutes of entertainment time daily). ZenScreen empowers kids to make smart choices. 

* QUIET TIME: 
Make apps disappear with the tap of a button for device-free dinner, family time, etc. Think of it as a mini-break from technology to help you recharge your brain.

All this without the need to upload screenshots every day or need for USB cable and complex supervised installation.

Why mindful adults love ZenScreen:
* Most of us know we need help to limit our tech use. ZenScreen is the perfect assistant to help you do that
* Lets parents lead by example, so kids are more likely to follow good screen habits
* Super efficient: Does not slow down your network or drain your battery. Does not run in the background or use GPS continuously

Why kids like ZenScreen (yes, really):
* Respect for privacy: Kids see the exact same dashboard as you see. Nothing to hide.
* Empowerment: Once you agree on the right set of rules, kids can manage their own usage.
* Predictable: Let's face it, parents can be a bit 鈥渞andom鈥 about screen time rules from day to day. ZenScreen makes things crystal clear and helps avert lots of fights and frustrations.

*** For the best results, we encourage parents to talk to their kids about the upside of using ZenScreen.


Pricing info:
* Free features: Screen usage dashboard. Split between entertainment and productive time.
* Premium features: You get 10-day free trial to test Smart Mornings, Calm Nights, Activity Limit and Quiet Time. After that, these features require a subscription. We will not charge automatically unless you subscribe after the initial trial period. You can cancel anytime.

ZenScreen subscription details:
Monthly subscription pricing: 4.99 USD
Annual subscription pricing: 47.99 USD (20% discount)
* Prices are displayed in USD, actual charges will be converted to local currency.

Apple subscription terms:
- Payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. 
- Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period
- Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to user鈥檚 Account Settings after purchase

Some important info:
If you have any questions or concerns, please write to us at support@zenscreen.ai
More info: www.zenscreen.ai
Privacy policy: www.zenscreen.ai/privacypolicy
Terms of service: www.zenscreen.ai/termsofservice

title: Zodiac Horoscope & Astrology
description:
Welcome to the Horoscopes & Astrology app! Curious what today, or this week, month, and year have in store for your zodiac sign? You鈥檝e come to the right place. 

Horoscopes & Astrology offers many free and premium ways for you to gain valuable insight and wisdom from the stars above. Our team of expert astrologers, psychics, and tarot card readers provides insight on love, careers, money, health, and more for all zodiac signs:

Aries 
Taurus
Gemini 
Cancer 
Leo
Virgo
Libra
Scorpio
Sagittarius
Capricorn
Aquarius
Pisces

Our horoscope app features a ton of daily horoscopes, tarot card readings, links to psychic readings, free and premium games, and so much more. If you need astrological wisdom, advice from the cosmos, or daily updates for your zodiac sign, download the Horoscopes & Astrology app now!

Horoscopes and Daily Horoscopes
We provide free daily, weekly, and monthly horoscopes for all sun signs/signs of the zodiac. We also offer:

- Free Love Horoscopes, Career Horoscopes, Money Horoscopes, and Health Horoscopes (for today, tomorrow, weekly, monthly, and for 2018)
- Premium, in-depth Chinese Horoscopes for the year 2018
- Premium, in-depth 2018 Horoscope readings; see what the year has in store for you!

Tarot Card Readings
The Horoscopes & Astrology app also offers insight and advice in the form of tarot! You鈥檒l find many free tarot card readings and premium, in-depth readings to help you interpret the happenings and relationships in your life. Your tarot options include:

- Free Daily Tarot Card Readings for Love, Career, Mood, and Make-a-Wish
- Free 鈥淐ard of The Day鈥 for all users 鈥 including keywords you should be focusing on and astrological correspondence for certain zodiac signs. 
- Premium, in-depth True Love Tarot and Yes/No Tarot Card readings 鈥 performed by experienced, professional tarot readers!

Love Compatibility
Use the wisdom from ancient astrology to evaluate your next romantic match! Our horoscope app offers free Love Match readings for all signs. 

All you have to do is choose your zodiac sign and the sign of your romantic partner. Based on the characteristics of each sun sign, we鈥檒l determine whether the relationship is destined for bliss or headed down a bumpy road. 

If you鈥檙e looking for more insight, the Horoscopes & Astrology app also offers premium Love Compatibility Charts. A professional astrologer will tell you all about the path of your relationship as well as tips for fostering a happy union. 

Free Astrology Games
After you gain valuable astrological insight from your horoscope or tarot reading, stick around and play one of our free astrology games. Games include:

- Magic 8 Ball and Magic Love Ball 鈥 just shake your phone to get instant answers to any yes or no question related to life and love. 
- Fortune Cookie and Love Cookie 鈥 shake your phone, crack open your cookie, and get valuable fortunes for you day-to-day personal and love lives. 
- Mood Ring 鈥 rub the mood ring and get insight into your current mood, desires, and actions you should take to capitalize on the two.

Psychic Readings
With our app, you can also find links to premium psychic readings on Horoscope.com. New users get 10 minutes with a professional psychic for just $1.99!

title: ZP Challenge - Better Choices
description:
With the all-new ZP app, it鈥檚 never been easier or more fun to transform your life and score big money! The newest app includes personalized stories and tips based on your interests, ZP Assist free resources and hotlines, a custom leaderboard to monitor your success and a Recommendation Store where you can shop for tools that helped other ZP heroes hit their goals. All you have to do is make better choices in any of the categories that make sense for you: food, fitness, family and money. The best part is you decide what makes a better choice. Enter the 21-Day ZP Challenge, and you鈥檒l be eligible for amazing cash prizes. Start your ZP journey today!

You鈥檙e the boss
What defines a better choice is completely up to you 鈥 the 鈥渞ight way鈥 to ZP is yours and yours alone. ZP supports you with encouragement, inspiration and tons of love at every step along the way!

NEW! Enjoy your personalized newsfeed
Every day, the ZP app customizes your newsfeed with helpful tips and uplifting stories selected just for you, based on your interests and goals.

NEW! Get free guidance with ZP Assist
Benefit from free help and resources along with thousands of real-life stories to support you on your journey. 

NEW! Gear up with tips & tools from the Recommendation Store
ZP heroes share their secrets to success, including products that helped them reach their goals 鈥 so you can, too! 

NEW! Chart your success
Your personal leaderboard tracks your progress and helps you stay motivated. 

Be a star!
Share your story, photos and videos with us 鈥 and you might be featured on the ZP app.

Take the 21-Day Challenge
Once you enter your first better choice, you鈥檙e part of the 21-Day Challenge. Make as many better choices as you like during a 21-day period, and you鈥檙e eligible to enter to win giant cash awards from our grand prize pool.

The ZP Challenge contest is not affiliated with Apple, Inc.  See Terms of Service and Contest Rules inside the app.

聽Is the most comprehensive application that covers all the features that every Muslim needs.
The Notification of the times of prayer in a timely manner . Quran without Internet voice more than 50 readers. We must imitate the life of the Prophet Muhammad in order to bless God in everything. It is not difficult to follow the teachings of Islam, no matter where you are. Through our application, we hope to help you monitor Islamic religious education more diligently and become a better Muslim. Some of our best features are the features you need most. We use technology so that we can observe all the teachings of Islam no matter where we are. Take a look at our features below.
========================
MAIN FEATURES OF Muslim Plus: 
========================
鈥 prayer time
We offer local Azan time so you know when you should pray. It's very accurate compared to other applications that provide a similar feature. Learn Time To:
鈥 Daybreak
鈥 Back
鈥 age
鈥 Morocco, West, sunset
鈥 the Dinner
It will also help you to know when fasting during the month of Ramadan.
鈥 the kiss
Using compact phone functions such as compass and location, we can help you find the Qiblah direction. To make sure your qibla works better and more accurately, please calibrate your phone compass frequently.
鈥 Read or listen to the Holy Quran
As a Muslim, it is important to read the Qur'an constantly. We offer a section where you can read the verses of the Qur'an or listen to the readers who read them. There are +50 readers to choose from. If you want to access the Quran while there is no Internet, you can do so by downloading the content on your phone first.
Other Features:
鈥 Modern and simple interface
鈥 Simple and flexible in mobility
鈥 Use the application without Internet
鈥 No need to download separate applications, Azan, Azkar, and others.
鈥 50 readers to choose from.
So, download our application now and feel comfortable observing Islamic teachings and prayers!
Do you enjoy using our app? Please take some time to support this app by leaving feedback and review. Your feedback is highly appreciated!

title: 鍜曞櫆缇庡浗閫 (Guruin)
description:
銆愬叧浜庡挄鍣滅編鍥介氥
鍜曞櫆缇庡浗閫 (Guruin.com) 鏄渶 in 鐨勫寳缇庡崕浜哄ū涔愮敓娲诲钩鍙. 涓嶇鏄悆鍠濈帺涔, 杩樻槸琛ｉ浣忚, 浣犻兘鑳藉湪杩欓噷鎵惧埌鏈鏂扮殑璧勮鍜屾渶鏈夌敤鐨勬敾鐣, 鎸囧崡. 闄ゆ浠ュ, 鎴戜滑杩樻湁鏂伴矞濂界帺鐨勬椿鍔ㄨ鎭, 鑰屼笖姣忓懆閮藉畼鏂圭粍缁囦笂澶╀笅娴峰悇绉嶆椿鍔.

銆愬姛鑳戒粙缁嶃
1. 棣栭〉
- 鍩轰簬淇℃伅娴佺殑璧勮灞曠ず: 鍖呮嫭缇庡浗澶存潯, 鏀荤暐, 娲诲姩, 闂瓟绛夊绉嶈祫缁煎悎璁, 鏍规嵁鍏磋叮鍜岀儹闂ㄧ▼搴﹀睍绀.
- 缃《鏄剧ず鐨勫挄鍣滃ご鏉, 闅忔椂闅忓湴鎺屾彙鏈湴鐑偣鏂伴椈.

2. 鍙戠幇
- 鎼滅储鏀荤暐, 娲诲姩, 缇ょ粍, 鏅偣, 鍜岀敤鎴.
- 鍒嗛棬鍒被鏌ユ壘淇℃伅.

3. 鍜曞櫆缇庡浗澶存潯
- 鍗虫椂鏇存柊鐨勭編鍥芥椂浜嬫柊闂, 鏂伴矞浜, 璐墿浼樻儬淇℃伅, 鍙婃湰鍦板叓鍗︾瓑.
- 鐐瑰嚮杩涘叆鏂伴椈婧愯缁嗛槄璇

4. 鐜╀箰鍙婄敓娲绘敾鐣
- 鎸夌収鍦扮悊浣嶇疆鍜屼富棰樻煡鎵炬敾鐣, 鍚冨枬鐜╀箰琛ｉ浣忚涓鏉￠緳.
- 鍒嗕韩, 璇勮鍜屾敹钘忓姛鑳.
- 鍩庡競闆疯揪, 甯偍蹇熷彂鐜板懆杈瑰ソ鍚冨ソ鐜╃殑

5. 娲诲姩
- 瀹樻柟缁存姢鏈鏂版渶鍏ㄧ殑, 娲涙潐鐭, 婀惧尯, 绾界害, 瑗块泤鍥剧瓑澶氬湴鐨勫懆鏈椿鍔ㄤ俊鎭.
- 浠樿垂娲诲姩鏀寔淇＄敤鍗℃敮浠.
- 瀹屾暣鐨勬椿鍔ㄤ俊鎭: 鏃堕棿, 鍦扮偣, 娲诲姩浠嬬粛, 鍥剧墖, 鍙傚姞浜哄憳, 娉ㄦ剰浜嬮」绛.

6. 鍑鸿/棰勫畾
- 娲涙潐鐭舵湰鍦扮帺涔愰」鐩, 鏀寔鍦ㄧ嚎棰勮
- 鏈虹エ棰勫畾
- 鐢ㄨ溅/鍖呰溅/鏈哄満鎺ラ

7. 鍟嗗
- 鍟嗗鍩烘湰淇℃伅, 鐐硅瘎, 鍥剧墖
- 鍜曞櫆鍚堜綔鍟嗗鎻愪緵鐨勫害鍋"鍜曞櫆绂忓埄鍒"

8. 绀句氦
- 璧㈠彇绮変笣, 鑾峰緱鐐硅禐.
- 璐＄尞鍐呭, 鍙傚姞娲诲姩, 璧欸甯, 鍗囩骇鍚勭被杈句汉.

title: 携薪写械泻褋.袧械写胁懈卸懈屑芯褋褌褜
description:
袧邪 携薪写械泻褋.袧械写胁懈卸懈屑芯褋褌懈 芯谐褉芯屑薪邪褟 斜邪蟹邪 芯斜褗褟胁谢械薪懈泄 芯褌 邪谐械薪褌芯胁 懈 褋芯斜褋褌胁械薪薪懈泻芯胁: 泻芯屑薪邪褌褘, 泻胁邪褉褌懈褉褘, 写芯屑邪 懈 褍褔邪褋褌泻懈 胁 袦芯褋泻胁械, 小邪薪泻褌-袩械褌械褉斜褍褉谐械 懈 写褉褍谐懈褏 谐芯褉芯写邪褏 袪芯褋褋懈懈. 袝卸械写薪械胁薪芯 锌芯谢褜蟹芯胁邪褌械谢懈 写芯斜邪胁谢褟褞褌 50 000 褋胁械卸懈褏 芯斜褗褟胁谢械薪懈泄. 校泻邪卸懈褌械 锌芯写褏芯写褟褖懈械 泻褉懈褌械褉懈懈 懈 胁褘斜懈褉邪泄褌械 芯斜褗褟胁谢械薪懈褟 懈蟹 褋锌懈褋泻邪 懈谢懈 薪邪 泻邪褉褌械 谐芯褉芯写邪.
 
效褌芯斜褘 锌芯懈褋泻 斜褘谢 锌褉芯褋褌褘屑, 邪 械谐芯 褉械蟹褍谢褜褌邪褌褘 鈥 屑邪泻褋懈屑邪谢褜薪芯 褌芯褔薪褘屑懈, 胁 锌褉懈谢芯卸械薪懈懈 胁褘 屑芯卸械褌械 薪邪褋褌褉芯懈褌褜 屑薪芯卸械褋褌胁芯 锌邪褉邪屑械褌褉芯胁:
鈥 校泻邪蟹邪褌褜, 褏芯褌懈褌械 胁褘 泻褍锌懈褌褜 懈谢懈 褋薪褟褌褜 卸懈谢褜褢.
鈥 袙褘斜褉邪褌褜 褋褌邪薪褑懈懈 屑械褌褉芯, 褉邪泄芯薪褘, 褍谢懈褑褘 懈谢懈 薪邪褉懈褋芯胁邪褌褜 芯斜谢邪褋褌懈 锌芯懈褋泻邪 薪邪 泻邪褉褌械.
鈥 校褌芯褔薪懈褌褜 泻芯谢懈褔械褋褌胁芯 泻芯屑薪邪褌, 懈褏 锌谢芯褖邪写褜, 褍写邪谢褢薪薪芯褋褌褜 芯褌 屑械褌褉芯, 谐芯写 锌芯褋褌褉芯泄泻懈 写芯屑邪, 薪邪谢懈褔懈械 斜褘褌芯胁芯泄 褌械褏薪懈泻懈 懈 屑械斜械谢懈 懈 械褖褢 斜芯谢械械 写械褋褟褌懈 锌邪褉邪屑械褌褉芯胁. 袙 芯斜褗褟胁谢械薪懈懈 斜褍写械褌 褍泻邪蟹邪薪邪 斜芯谢械械 锌芯谢薪邪褟 懈薪褎芯褉屑邪褑懈褟 芯 褋邪屑芯屑 蟹写邪薪懈懈 懈 褍写芯斜褋褌胁邪褏 鈥 锌邪褉泻芯胁泻械, 谢懈褎褌械, 屑褍褋芯褉芯锌褉芯胁芯写械. 
鈥 校斜褉邪褌褜 胁邪褉懈邪薪褌褘 褋 泻芯屑懈褋褋懈械泄 邪谐械薪褌褍.
鈥 小芯褏褉邪薪懈褌褜 锌芯薪褉邪胁懈胁褕懈械褋褟 芯斜褗褟胁谢械薪懈褟 胁 芦袠蟹斜褉邪薪薪芯械禄, 褔褌芯斜褘 锌芯褌芯屑 胁械褉薪褍褌褜褋褟 泻 薪懈屑.
鈥 袩芯写锌懈褋邪褌褜褋褟 薪邪 薪芯胁褘械 芯斜褗褟胁谢械薪懈褟 褋 懈薪褌械褉械褋褍褞褖懈屑懈 胁邪褋 锌邪褉邪屑械褌褉邪屑懈, 褔褌芯斜褘 薪械 锌褉芯锌褍褋褌懈褌褜 胁褘谐芯写薪褘械 锌褉械写谢芯卸械薪懈褟 胁 褏芯褉芯褕械屑 褉邪泄芯薪械.
鈥 袩芯蟹胁芯薪懈褌褜 锌芯 蟹邪懈薪褌械褉械褋芯胁邪胁褕械屑褍 锌褉械写谢芯卸械薪懈褞 锌褉褟屑芯 懈蟹 锌褉懈谢芯卸械薪懈褟, 薪械 锌械褉械锌懈褋褘胁邪褟 薪芯屑械褉 褋 褝泻褉邪薪邪 褌械谢械褎芯薪邪. 袗 芦袠褋褌芯褉懈褟 蟹胁芯薪泻芯胁禄 褋芯褏褉邪薪懈褌 胁褋械 芯斜褗褟胁谢械薪懈褟, 锌芯 泻芯褌芯褉褘屑 胁褘 褍卸械 蟹胁芯薪懈谢懈.
鈥 袧邪泄褌懈 泻胁邪褉褌懈褉褍 胁 薪芯胁芯褋褌褉芯泄泻械: 褋锌械褑懈邪谢褜薪褘泄 褎懈谢褜褌褉 胁褘斜械褉械褌 褌芯谢褜泻芯 锌褉械写谢芯卸械薪懈褟 芯褌 蟹邪褋褌褉芯泄褖懈泻芯胁. 袙褋械 芯斜褗褟胁谢械薪懈褟 褋谐褉褍锌锌懈褉芯胁邪薪褘 锌芯 卸懈谢褘屑 泻芯屑锌谢械泻褋邪屑 鈥 胁褘斜械褉懈褌械 谢褞斜芯泄, 褔褌芯斜褘 褍胁懈写械褌褜 褋锌懈褋芯泻 泻胁邪褉褌懈褉 懈 懈褏 锌谢邪薪懈褉芯胁泻褍, 褍蟹薪邪褌褜 褑械薪褘 懈 写邪褌褍 褋写邪褔懈 卸懈谢褜褟.
鈥 袨褑械薪懈褌褜 薪邪 褌械锌谢芯胁芯泄 泻邪褉褌械, 薪邪褋泻芯谢褜泻芯 泻芯屑褎芯褉褌械薪 褌芯褌 懈谢懈 懈薪芯泄 褉邪泄芯薪 写谢褟 卸懈蟹薪懈. 袗薪邪谢懈蟹懈褉褍褞褌褋褟 写邪薪薪褘械 芯 褔懈褋褌芯褌械 胁芯蟹写褍褏邪, 褌褉邪薪褋锌芯褉褌薪芯泄 写芯褋褌褍锌薪芯褋褌懈 懈 懈薪褎褉邪褋褌褉褍泻褌褍褉械 (斜芯谢褜薪懈褑邪褏, 褕泻芯谢邪褏, 屑邪谐邪蟹懈薪邪褏, 褉邪蟹胁谢械褔械薪懈褟褏). 肖褍薪泻褑懈褟 写芯褋褌褍锌薪邪 褌芯谢褜泻芯 写谢褟 袦芯褋泻胁褘 懈 小邪薪泻褌-袩械褌械褉斜褍褉谐邪. 袛谢褟 袦芯褋泻胁褘 褌邪泻卸械 写芯褋褌褍锌薪邪 泻邪褉褌邪 褋 褉械泄褌懈薪谐芯屑 褕泻芯谢.
鈥 袠褋泻谢褞褔懈褌褜 懈蟹 锌芯懈褋泻邪 写芯屑邪, 胁泻谢褞褔褢薪薪褘械 胁 锌褉芯谐褉邪屑屑褍 褉械薪芯胁邪褑懈懈, 鈥 锌芯 懈褌芯谐邪屑 谐芯谢芯褋芯胁邪薪懈褟 卸懈谢褜褑芯胁 褌邪泻懈械 蟹写邪薪懈褟 屑芯谐褍褌 斜褘褌褜 褋薪械褋械薪褘.
鈥 袩芯褋屑芯褌褉械褌褜 锌邪薪芯褉邪屑褍 屑械褋褌薪芯褋褌懈, 谐写械 褉邪褋锌芯谢芯卸械薪 蟹邪懈薪褌械褉械褋芯胁邪胁褕懈泄 胁邪褋 胁邪褉懈邪薪褌.
 
肖褍薪泻褑懈褟 褋褔褢褌褔懈泻邪 锌褉芯褋屑芯褌褉邪 芯斜褗褟胁谢械薪懈泄 锌芯屑芯卸械褌 锌芯薪褟褌褜, 薪邪褋泻芯谢褜泻芯 芯斜褗褟胁谢械薪懈械 芯 锌褉芯写邪卸械 懈谢懈 褋写邪褔械 薪械写胁懈卸懈屑芯褋褌懈 锌芯谢褜蟹褍械褌褋褟 锌芯锌褍谢褟褉薪芯褋褌褜褞 懈 褋褌芯懈褌 谢懈 械谐芯 褋泻芯褉褉械泻褌懈褉芯胁邪褌褜. 校锌褉邪胁谢械薪懈械 芯锌褍斜谢懈泻芯胁邪薪薪褘屑懈 锌褉械写谢芯卸械薪懈褟屑懈 锌褉芯懈褋褏芯写懈褌 胁 谢懈褔薪芯屑 泻邪斜懈薪械褌械.
 
校褋褌邪薪芯胁懈褌械 锌褉懈谢芯卸械薪懈械, 薪邪褏芯写懈褌械 褋邪屑褘械 胁褘谐芯写薪褘械 胁邪褉懈邪薪褌褘, 斜褘褋褌褉芯 锌褉芯写邪胁邪泄褌械 懈谢懈 褋写邪胁邪泄褌械 薪械写胁懈卸懈屑芯褋褌褜!  
 
袝褋谢懈 褍 胁邪褋 胁芯蟹薪懈泻谢懈 胁芯锌褉芯褋褘 锌芯 褉邪斜芯褌械 褋 褋械褉胁懈褋芯屑, 薪邪锌懈褕懈褌械 薪邪屑: https://yandex.ru/support/realty/troubleshooting/feedback.html
 
袧邪褕 褋邪泄褌: https://realty.yandex.ru/

title: 携薪写械泻褋.袗褎懈褕邪 鈥 斜懈谢械褌褘
description:
袩芯泻褍锌邪泄褌械 斜懈谢械褌褘 胁 泻懈薪芯, 薪邪泻邪锌谢懈胁邪泄褌械 斜芯薪褍褋褘 懈 懈褋锌芯谢褜蟹褍泄褌械 懈褏 写谢褟 芯锌谢邪褌褘 斜懈谢械褌芯胁 薪邪 泻芯薪褑械褉褌褘 懈 胁 褌械邪褌褉! 袘芯薪褍褋薪褘械 斜邪谢谢褘 屑芯卸薪芯 锌芯褌褉邪褌懈褌褜 褔械褉械蟹 褌褉芯械 褋褍褌芯泻 锌芯褋谢械 屑械褉芯锌褉懈褟褌懈褟 懈 胁 褌械褔械薪懈械 胁褋械谐芯 谐芯写邪.

鈥 袘懈谢械褌褘 胁 泻懈薪芯
鈥 袘芯薪褍褋褘 鈥 写芯 20% 芯褌 褋褌芯懈屑芯褋褌懈 锌芯泻褍锌芯泻
鈥 校写芯斜薪褘泄 胁褘斜芯褉 屑械褋褌 锌芯 褑械薪械
鈥 袘械蟹芯锌邪褋薪邪褟 芯锌谢邪褌邪 泻邪褉褌芯泄 懈 Apple Pay
鈥 袪邪蟹写械谢 褋芯 胁褋械屑懈 泻褍锌谢械薪薪褘屑懈 斜懈谢械褌邪屑懈
鈥 袙褘谐芯写薪褘械 锌褉械写谢芯卸械薪懈褟, 邪泻褑懈懈 懈 褋泻懈写泻懈

携薪写械泻褋.袗褎懈褕邪 鈥 锌褉懈谢芯卸械薪懈械 写谢褟 褍写芯斜薪芯泄 懈 胁褘谐芯写薪芯泄 锌芯泻褍锌泻懈 斜懈谢械褌芯胁 胁 泻懈薪芯, 褌械邪褌褉褘 懈 薪邪 泻芯薪褑械褉褌褘. 袣褍锌懈褌械 斜懈谢械褌 薪邪 褎懈谢褜屑 鈥 懈 20% 械谐芯 褋褌芯懈屑芯褋褌懈 蟹邪褔懈褋谢褟褌褋褟 薪邪 胁邪褕 斜芯薪褍褋薪褘泄 褋褔褢褌. 袩褉懈 锌芯泻褍锌泻械 斜懈谢械褌芯胁 薪邪 写褉褍谐懈械 胁懈写褘 褋芯斜褘褌懈泄 胁械褉薪褍褌褋褟 10% 芯褌 褋褍屑屑褘.

袧邪泻芯锌谢械薪薪褘械 斜邪谢谢褘 屑芯卸薪芯 懈褋锌芯谢褜蟹芯胁邪褌褜 锌褉懈 芯锌谢邪褌械 斜懈谢械褌芯胁 薪邪 泻芯薪褑械褉褌褘, 屑褞蟹懈泻谢褘 懈 写褉褍谐懈械 褕芯褍 鈥 锌芯泻邪 褌芯谢褜泻芯 褌械, 褔褌芯 锌褉芯褏芯写褟褌 胁 袦芯褋泻胁械, 小邪薪泻褌-袩械褌械褉斜褍褉谐械, 袣邪蟹邪薪懈, 袝泻邪褌械褉懈薪斜褍褉谐械, 袧懈卸薪械屑 袧芯胁谐芯褉芯写械, 小芯褔懈, 袣褉邪褋薪芯写邪褉械, 袙芯褉芯薪械卸械, 袪芯褋褌芯胁械-薪邪-袛芯薪褍 懈 袧芯胁芯褋懈斜懈褉褋泻械. (袧芯 褝褌芯 锌芯泻邪, 谐械芯谐褉邪褎懈褟 芯褏胁邪褌邪 斜褍写械褌 褉邪褋褕懈褉褟褌褜褋褟.) 袪邪褋褔褢褌 锌褉芯褋褌芯泄: 1 斜邪谢谢 = 1 褉褍斜谢褜 褋泻懈写泻懈. 袘芯薪褍褋邪屑懈 屑芯卸薪芯 芯锌谢邪褌懈褌褜 写芯 80% 褋褌芯懈屑芯褋褌懈 斜懈谢械褌邪.

袣 褌芯屑褍 卸械, 携薪写械泻褋.袗褎懈褕邪 鈥 褝褌芯 薪械 褌芯谢褜泻芯 斜邪谢谢褘. 小 薪械泄 胁褘 薪械 锌褉芯锌褍褋褌懈褌械 泻芯薪褑械褉褌 谢褞斜懈屑芯泄 谐褉褍锌锌褘 懈 斜褍写械褌械 胁芯胁褉械屑褟 褍蟹薪邪胁邪褌褜 芯 谐褉芯屑泻懈褏 褋芯斜褘褌懈褟褏 胁 胁邪褕械屑 谐芯褉芯写械, 邪泻褑懈褟褏 懈 褋泻懈写泻邪褏. 袙邪屑 斜芯谢褜褕械 薪械 锌褉懈写褢褌褋褟 懈褋泻邪褌褜 斜懈谢械褌褘 胁 锌芯褔褌芯胁芯屑 褟褖懈泻械: 胁褋械 锌芯泻褍锌泻懈 斜褍写褍褌 褏褉邪薪懈褌褜褋褟 胁 褋锌械褑懈邪谢褜薪芯屑 褉邪蟹写械谢械 锌褉懈谢芯卸械薪懈褟. 袗 械褋谢懈 胁 泻懈薪芯褌械邪褌褉械 械褋褌褜 褋泻邪薪械褉褘 Smartpass, 屑芯卸薪芯 锌褉芯褋褌芯 芯褌泻褉褘褌褜 斜懈谢械褌 薪邪 褝泻褉邪薪械 褌械谢械褎芯薪邪, 芦锌芯泻邪蟹邪褌褜禄 械谐芯 褋泻邪薪械褉褍 懈 锌褉芯褏芯写懈褌褜 胁 蟹邪谢.

title: 袗褍写懈芯袙械写邪
description:
袦芯卸薪芯 谢械谐泻芯 胁褘斜褉邪褌褜 邪胁褌芯褉芯胁 懈 谢械泻褑懈懈 锌芯 褌械屑邪屑. 袙芯 胁褉械屑褟 锌褉芯褋谢褍褕懈胁邪薪懈褟 屑芯卸薪芯 械褖褢 懈 褔懈褌邪褌褜 谢械泻褑懈褞, 懈谢懈 锌褉芯褋褌芯 褔懈褌邪褌褜, 械褋谢懈 薪械褌 胁芯蟹屑芯卸薪芯褋褌懈 褋谢褍褕邪褌褜. 袦芯卸薪芯 芯褌谢芯卸懈褌褜 懈薪褌械褉械褋薪褘械 谢械泻褑懈懈 胁 锌邪锌泻褍 芦袠蟹斜褉邪薪薪芯械禄, 褔褌芯斜褘 锌芯褋谢褍褕邪褌褜 锌芯褌芯屑. 袙 锌邪锌泻械 芦小芯褏褉邪薪褢薪薪芯械禄 褏褉邪薪褟褌褋褟 胁褋械 褋泻邪褔邪薪薪褘械 谢械泻褑懈懈. 

袝褖褢 屑芯卸薪芯 薪邪锌芯屑薪懈褌褜 褋械斜械, 泻邪泻懈械 谢械泻褑懈懈 薪械 斜褘谢懈 锌褉芯褋谢褍褕邪薪褘 写芯 泻芯薪褑邪, (械褋谢懈 锌芯泄褌懈 胁 锌邪锌泻褍 袠褋褌芯褉懈褟 锌褉芯褋谢褍褕懈胁邪薪懈泄 褌邪屑 胁懈写械薪 锌褉芯褑械薪褌). 袦芯卸薪芯 胁褘斜褉邪褌褜 谢械泻褑懈懈, 泻芯褌芯褉褘械 芯褔械薪褜 锌芯薪褉邪胁懈谢懈褋褜, 械褋谢懈 泻谢懈泻薪褍褌褜 薪邪 蟹胁械蟹写芯褔泻褍.

袙褋褢 褋胁芯械 褌械锌械褉褜 褋 褋芯斜芯泄

袦芯卸薪芯 锌褉芯泄褌懈 褉械谐懈褋褌褉邪褑懈褞 锌褉褟屑芯 胁 锌褉懈谢芯卸械薪懈懈, 械褋谢懈 械褖械 薪械褌 邪泻泻邪褍薪褌邪 薪邪 褋邪泄褌械 芦袗褍写懈芯袙械写邪禄.

校写芯斜薪邪褟 蟹邪泻邪褔泻邪 褎邪泄谢芯胁

- 袦芯卸薪芯 褋泻邪褔懈胁邪褌褜 谢械泻褑懈懈 锌褉褟屑芯 胁 锌邪屑褟褌褜 屑芯斜懈谢褜薪芯谐芯 褍褋褌褉芯泄褋褌胁邪, 懈 锌芯锌芯谢薪懈褌褜 褋胁芯褞 斜懈斜谢懈芯褌械泻褍 褔械褉械蟹 屑芯斜懈谢褜薪褘泄 懈薪褌械褉薪械褌 胁 屑械褌褉芯 懈谢懈 褋懈写褟 胁 泻邪褎械, 谐写械 械褋褌褜 WiFi. 袠 斜芯谢褜褕械 薪懈泻邪泻懈褏 锌褉芯胁芯写芯胁 懈 锌芯褌械褉褜 胁褉械屑械薪懈 薪邪 锌械褉械褌邪褋泻懈胁邪薪懈械 褎邪泄谢芯胁 褌褍写邪-褋褞写邪! + 

袝褋褌褜 胁芯蟹屑芯卸薪芯褋褌褜 蟹邪谐褉褍蟹懈褌褜 芯写薪懈屑 泻谢懈泻芯屑 褋褉邪蟹褍 胁褋械 邪褍写懈芯 胁褏芯写褟褖懈械 胁 褑懈泻谢 谢械泻褑懈泄.

袠褋褌芯褉懈褟 锌褉芯褋谢褍褕懈胁邪薪懈褟 褋 褋邪泄褌邪

- 袙褋褢, 褔褌芯 褉邪薪褜褕械 褋谢褍褕邪谢芯褋褜 薪邪 褋邪泄褌械 - 褌械锌械褉褜 写芯褋褌褍锌薪芯 胁 褌械谢械褎芯薪械 胁 胁懈写械 袠褋褌芯褉懈懈. 袗 械褋谢懈 褋谢褍褕邪械褕褜 薪邪 褌械谢械褎芯薪械 胁 写芯褉芯谐械, 褌芯 锌芯褌芯屑 懈褋褌芯褉懈褟 褌邪泻-卸械 芯斜薪芯胁谢褟械褌褋褟 懈 胁懈写薪邪 薪邪 褋邪泄褌械 胁 谢懈褔薪芯屑 褉邪蟹写械谢械. 

袠蟹斜褉邪薪薪芯械

- 小锌懈褋芯泻 懈蟹斜褉邪薪薪褘褏 谢械泻褑懈泄 褋懈薪褏褉芯薪懈蟹懈褉褍械褌褋褟 褋 褋邪泄褌芯屑 懈 胁懈写械薪 胁 屑芯斜懈谢褜薪芯屑. 袩芯褝褌芯屑褍 屑芯卸薪芯 谢械谐泻芯 蟹邪谐褉褍蟹懈褌褜  胁褋械 懈谢懈 薪械泻芯褌芯褉褘械 懈蟹斜褉邪薪薪褘械 谢械泻褑懈懈 胁 褌械谢械褎芯薪.

小芯褏褉邪薪械薪薪褘械

- 袩褉懈谢芯卸械薪懈械 胁褋械谐写邪 锌芯写褋泻邪卸械褌 泻邪泻懈械 屑邪褌械褉懈邪谢褘 胁 褌械谢械褎芯薪械 褋胁械卸懈械, 邪 泻邪泻懈械 褍卸械 锌褉芯褋谢褍褕邪薪褘 懈 懈褏 屑芯卸薪芯 褍写邪谢懈褌褜, 褔褌芯斜褘 蟹邪谐褉褍蟹懈褌褜 胁 薪械谐芯 薪芯胁褘械. 小芯褉褌懈褉芯胁泻懈 锌芯 写邪褌械 蟹邪谐褉褍蟹泻懈, 褉邪蟹屑械褉褍 褎邪泄谢邪, 薪邪蟹胁邪薪懈褞 谢械泻褑懈懈.
